translation.en: -Okay, well… -Uh, thanks for having us, Debbie.
translation.zh: -好了 嗯… -谢谢你邀请我们 黛比

translation.en: -Bye. -[man] Mmm.
translation.zh: 拜拜

translation.en: -You're so bad at poker. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你牌打得好烂 -是啊

translation.en: I'm actually good at other things.
translation.zh: 我其实擅长别的事情

translation.en: Wait, now I get it.
translation.zh: 等一下 我现在明白了

translation.en: Mmm!
translation.zh: （无洞耳环）

translation.en: I can't believe-- That's so cool. You own your own house.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 太酷了 你拥有自己的房子

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Well, I saved up for the down payment over, you know, some time.
translation.zh: 首付款我还是攒了一段时间

translation.en: I put money away through careful calculations.
translation.zh: 我经过了精细的计算才把钱存了下来

translation.en: Nice. Amazing.
translation.zh: 我经过了精细的计算才把钱存了下来 好厉害

translation.en: When I destroy my life, can I move in with you?
translation.zh: 等我毁掉了自己的人生时 我能搬来跟你住吗？

translation.en: -Deal! -Amazing! [laughs]
translation.zh: -成！ -太好了！

translation.en: -Whoa! Look at all those books! -Yeah, I'm a big reader.
translation.zh: -看看那些书！ -是啊 我非常喜欢读书

translation.en: Are you? That's great. I-- Yeah, I'm gonna be a big writer one day.
translation.zh: 是吗？那太好了 有朝一日 我会成为一个大作家

translation.en: -What? -I want to be. Okay, I bet you will be.
translation.zh: -我想当作家 -什么？好吧 我敢肯定你会成功的

translation.en: How did you get to be so awesome?
translation.zh: 你怎么能够这么优秀？

translation.en: [Debbie] You know you don't have to say any of this?
translation.zh: 你知道你不必说这些的哦？

translation.en: -I'm gonna sleep with you anyway. -Unbelievable!
translation.zh: -反正我都会跟你睡的 -难以置信！

translation.en: I'm gonna send you my short stories in the morning.
translation.zh: 等早上 我把我的短篇故事发给你

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Mmm. I think you'll like them.
translation.zh: 我觉得你会喜欢它们的

translation.en: -Mm-mmm. Okay. -Okay, I'll stop talk-- -Just be quiet now. Yeah. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -现在快闭嘴 对 -我会打住…抱歉

translation.en: -I've actually written 23 short stories. -[Debbie] Oh, God, just stop.
translation.zh: 其实我写了23个短篇故事 天啊 闭嘴

translation.en: [sighs] Good morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: Good morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: Happy birthday, much younger person.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 比我年轻好多的人

translation.en: What? We're the same age.
translation.zh: 什么？我们同岁啊

translation.en: Not in lady years.
translation.zh: 女人可不这么算

translation.en: In lady years, I'm a crone,
translation.zh: 按照我们的记法 我已经人老珠黄了

translation.en: and somehow you'll still be considered sexy at, like, 70,
translation.zh: 但不知道为什么 等你七十岁 又皱又秃的时候

translation.en: no matter how wrinkled and bald you get.
translation.zh: 却还是会被视作很性感

translation.en: -Yeah. -So congratulations. I'll admit it. It's a good deal.
translation.zh: -所以恭喜你 -我承认 这是笔好买卖

translation.en: Oh, I got you the greatest birthday present.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了世间最棒的生日礼物

translation.en: You got me a Porsche? A 356?
translation.zh: 你给我买了一辆保时捷？一辆356？

translation.en: No, the 911 in purple, right?
translation.zh: 不是 紫色的911 对吧？

translation.en: [woman] Do you want coffee?
translation.zh: 你要喝咖啡吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, thank you.
translation.zh: 好啊 谢谢

translation.en: You know what? Let me call you back.
translation.zh: 好了 我晚点再打给你

translation.en: You said you didn't need me to bring you anything in New York,
translation.zh: 你说过不用我帮你带什么东西

translation.en: but do you have any herb plants?
translation.zh: 但是你有种香草吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You know, herb plants? Never mind, I'll just pick some up.
translation.zh: 香草？算了 我去弄一点

translation.en: You pop them in the windowsill and then you have fresh basil or mint
translation.zh: 你把它们放在窗台 然后在你做饭要用到它

translation.en: anytime you need to cook with it, or eat it, or just smell it.
translation.zh: 想吃它 或想闻闻它时 就能随时都有新鲜的罗勒和薄荷了

translation.en: Okay, Debbie, please do not bring soil into my apartment. I'm begging you.
translation.zh: 黛比 拜托不要 把土带到我的公寓来 我求你了

translation.en: Big shocker, you listen to The Cars in the morning.
translation.zh: 我毫不惊讶 你一大早就听“汽车乐队”的歌

translation.en: -[chuckles] Morning, noon, and night. -Oh, I wanted to mention,
translation.zh: 早上、中午、还有晚上 我在你家时 如果你想带人回家

translation.en: when I'm at your place, if you wanna have somebody over,
translation.zh: 我在你家时 如果你想带人回家

translation.en: and you want me to get out of the way, I can do that, so you can…
translation.zh: 希望我不要碍事 我没问题的 所以…

translation.en: Okay, now I'm feeling uncomfortable. Oh, please, I've seen you naked.
translation.zh: -现在我觉得不太舒服了 -拜托 我都见过你的裸体了

translation.en: -Never stops being weird. -Which is so weird.
translation.zh: -一直都觉得很奇怪 -非常奇怪

translation.en: Thank you. I think I can control myself for one week.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我想我还是可以 控制住自己一个星期的

translation.en: You-- You never know, maybe you'll meet someone while you're here
translation.zh: 你在这里的时候 也许会有艳遇

translation.en: and we'll have a big ol' sex party up in here.
translation.zh: 然后我们就会在这儿 来一场盛大的性爱派对

translation.en: -Uh, barf? -Yeah, I'm sorry, that was gross.
translation.zh: -恶心？ -对 抱歉 确实挺恶心

translation.en: Anyway, no chance of me meeting anybody.
translation.zh: 总之 我是不可能有艳遇的

translation.en: As you know, my heart is a cold, hard little stone.
translation.zh: 如你所知 我的心已经冷若磐石了

translation.en: [inhales] I'm so glad you're not being dramatic about it.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你没有小题大做

translation.en: By the way, I am so proud of you for being cool about leaving Jack for a whole week.
translation.zh: 你能淡定地离开杰克一个星期 我非常为你骄傲

translation.en: I'm not being cool about it, I'm having a panic attack.
translation.zh: 我完全不淡定 我已经惊恐发作了 他是我的宝贝

translation.en: He's my baby. I've never left him for that long.
translation.zh: 我完全不淡定 我已经惊恐发作了 他是我的宝贝 而且我从来没有离开他这么久过 怪物苏醒了！

translation.en: -[Jack] Hey. -Ah, the creature awakens!
translation.zh: 而且我从来没有离开他这么久过 怪物苏醒了！

translation.en: -Morning. -Morning.
translation.zh: -早安 我能吃这个吗？ -早安

translation.en: - Can I eat this? -Yes, it's gluten-free.
translation.zh: -早安 我能吃这个吗？ -早安 -可以 它不含麸质 跟彼得打个招呼 -你好吗 彼得？

translation.en: -Also, say hi to Peter. -'Sup, Peter?
translation.zh: -可以 它不含麸质 跟彼得打个招呼 -你好吗 彼得？

translation.en: Hey! 'Sup, Jack-O'-Lantern?
translation.zh: -嘿！你好吗 “杰克南瓜灯”？ -什么？？

translation.en: -What? -[Peter] Oh, I'm working on nicknames. No?
translation.zh: -嘿！你好吗 “杰克南瓜灯”？ -什么？？ 我正在研究昵称 不好？

translation.en: No, he didn't like it.
translation.zh: 不好 他不喜欢

translation.en: -Go back to the drawing board on that one. -Look at him. He's not a baby.
translation.zh: -再重新想一个吧 -看看他 他不再是小宝宝了

translation.en: All right? He's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: -再重新想一个吧 -看看他 他不再是小宝宝了 他不会有事的

translation.en: It's not like you're leaving him with a dog bowl and a chew toy.
translation.zh: 你又不是只给他留个狗盆和磨牙玩具

translation.en: Right? Scarlet's gonna be there. You-- You want my opinion?
translation.zh: 你又不是只给他留个狗盆和磨牙玩具 斯卡丽特会在那里 你想听听我的意见吗？

translation.en: Just you saying that, I know exactly what your opinion is.
translation.zh: 听你这么说 我就知道你的意见了

translation.en: Look, he's not my kid, but I think Jack could use the space.
translation.zh: 听着 他不是我的孩子 但我觉得杰克需要一点空间

translation.en: All right, notes on parenting
translation.zh: 好吧 来自一个只养过一条金鱼

translation.en: from a guy whose only pet was a goldfish that died in a bong fire.
translation.zh: 而且金鱼还被火烧死的人的育儿经验

translation.en: Okay, look, I'm just saying. There's, like, helicopter parenting, there's snowplow parenting.
translation.zh: 有直升机式育儿法 还有扫雪机育儿法

translation.en: What you're doing? This is Saran Wrap parenting.
translation.zh: 而你的做法是什么？ 是保鲜膜式育儿法

translation.en: You're so tightly wrapped around this kid, you're suffocating him!
translation.zh: 你紧紧地包裹着这个孩子… 这会让他窒息的！

translation.en: -Yes, I can track a metaphor, thanks. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我听得出来这是隐喻 谢谢

translation.en: Okay, how excited are you that you and I are gonna be in the same city for a whole week?
translation.zh: 我们要在同一座城市待一个星期 你有没有很兴奋？

translation.en: When's the last time we hung out that long?
translation.zh: 我们上一次 一起待这么长时间是多久以前了？

translation.en: I don't know, 2008? When you left LA because you were scared of earthquakes.
translation.zh: 我不知道 2008年？ 你因为害怕地震而离开洛杉矶的时候

translation.en: Okay, hey! -The Chino Hills Temblor was no joke! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好吧 奇诺山地震可不是闹着玩的！

translation.en: Anyway, I know you have to go to work and I want to give you your present
translation.zh: 我知道你要去工作 我想在你离开前把礼物给你

translation.en: before you go. So I was cleaning out this drawer--
translation.zh: 我知道你要去工作 我想在你离开前把礼物给你 -我在清理抽屉的时候… -你清理东西？

translation.en: You clean things out?
translation.zh: -我在清理抽屉的时候… -你清理东西？

translation.en: Occasionally, I clean things out.
translation.zh: 我偶尔也会清理一下东西

translation.en: And look what I found!
translation.zh: 你看我找到了什么！

translation.en: I know you hate mementos.
translation.zh: 我知道你讨厌纪念品

translation.en: Yeah, no, I hate mementos above all mentos.
translation.zh: 是的 所有纪念中我最讨厌纪念品了

translation.en: Okay, hold on. Here's your present. Look.
translation.zh: 好吧 等一下 这就是你的礼物 你看

translation.en: I put this in the end table the night you stayed over,
translation.zh: 你在这儿过夜的那晚 我把这个放在茶几里了

translation.en: because, I don't know, I thought it would be a keepsake
translation.zh: 因为我以为 这会成为我们婚礼上的纪念物

translation.en: at our wedding or something. That's how dumb I was in my 20s.
translation.zh: 因为我以为 这会成为我们婚礼上的纪念物 -我20几岁的时候就是有这么傻 -你才不傻

translation.en: -You weren't dumb. -I was a little bit dumb.
translation.zh: -我20几岁的时候就是有这么傻 -你才不傻 有点傻吧

translation.en: Anyway, the best part of the whole night was when I took all your money!
translation.zh: 整晚最开心的事 就是我把你的钱都赢走了！

translation.en: That was the best part?
translation.zh: 这是最开心的事？

translation.en: I mean, it overshadowed the sex part, because you fled the next day.
translation.zh: 它让滚床单都黯然失色 因为你第二天就逃走了

translation.en: -Wait, hold on. I did call you later. -Yeah, you did call me later.
translation.zh: -我后来打电话给你啦 -对 你是打了 你说你不能跟我在一起

translation.en: When you said that you couldn't date me or anybody else
translation.zh: 你是打了 你说你不能跟我在一起 或跟任何其他人在一起 因为你是

translation.en: because you were, "an unknowable piece of shit"?
translation.zh: 或跟任何其他人在一起 因为你是 “一个寂寂无名的混蛋”？

translation.en: Uh, mmm, there's the writer in me right there. Now that's a beautiful turn of phrase.
translation.zh: 我心里住着个作家 那句话的辞藻很是美丽

translation.en: -And I'm the dramatic one? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 所以是我太小题大做咯？总之

translation.en: Anyway, 20 years of friendship. 20 years! Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 所以是我太小题大做咯？总之 二十年的友情 你能相信吗？

translation.en: You've had the best best friend in the entire world.
translation.zh: 你拥有世界上最优秀的朋友

translation.en: Back at you.
translation.zh: 你也一样啊

translation.en: Have a great birthday, Peter.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 彼得

translation.en: -I will. You're awesome. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 一定很快乐 你最棒了

translation.en: -Okay, I'll see you in a couple days. -[beeps]
translation.zh: 几天后见

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Geez, I thought you and Debbie were gonna blab, like, forever.
translation.zh: 我以为你和黛比要聊到天荒地老呢

translation.en: -Yeah, I know. I'm sorry about that. -So, what were you talking about?
translation.zh: -嗯 我知道 抱歉 -你们在聊什么呢？

translation.en: -Like, just stuff. -"Stuff"?
translation.zh: -就是随便聊聊 -“随便聊聊”？

translation.en: Okay, so your best friend, who's a woman who I've never met,
translation.zh: 好吧 所以就是你最好的朋友 一个我从没见过的女人

translation.en: just calls you on your birthday and you, like, talk forever?
translation.zh: 在你生日这天打电话给你 然后你们就聊得没完没了？

translation.en: Okay, it's not "a girl," it's Debbie.
translation.zh: 不是“女人” 是“黛比”

translation.en: Okay, obviously, I'm not jealous. I mean, look at me, but it's just weird.
translation.zh: 很明显 我不是吃醋 你看看我的样子 但这样很奇怪

translation.en: Becca?
translation.zh: 贝卡？

translation.en: I mean, if you like each other so much, why aren't you guys together?
translation.zh: 如果你们这么喜欢对方 为什么没在一起呢？

translation.en: [laughs] Me and Debbie? Yeah, 'cause.
translation.zh: 我和黛比？是啊 因为

translation.en: -Because… -She's…
translation.zh: 因为… 她是…她

translation.en: her.
translation.zh: 她是…她

translation.en: And I'm me.
translation.zh: 而我是我

translation.en: Oh, look at that. Should we get to work? Uber's here.
translation.zh: 我们要去上班了吗？ 叫的优步已经来了

translation.en: -You look great today. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 你今天真是明艳动人

translation.en: -Okay, tonight… -Mm-hmm. …at the Brownstone Club, do not tell them it's my birthday.
translation.zh: 对了 今晚去布朗石俱乐部 不要告诉他们是我的生日

translation.en: They'll make a big fuss out of it, and I just want it to be you and me.
translation.zh: 他们会小题大做的 而我只希望我们两个庆祝

translation.en: Peter…
translation.zh: 彼得…

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 嗯？

translation.en: What happens next?
translation.zh: 接下来会怎样？

translation.en: Like, wha-- After dinner? I-- I mean, I enjoy their flan.
translation.zh: 晚饭后吗？我很喜欢他们的烤奶冻

translation.en: Yeah, no, I-- I mean with us.
translation.zh: 嗯 不是 我是说我们俩

translation.en: I mean, we've been together for six months, and…
translation.zh: 我们在一起已经六个月了

translation.en: I just feel like we're not really getting any closer.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们的关系并没有更亲近

translation.en: -I mean, I don't know that much about you. -Yes, you do.
translation.zh: -我对你并不太了解 -不对 你了解

translation.en: -Uh… -I-- Look, I'll tell you anything. I'm an open book.
translation.zh: 我会把一切都告诉你 我对你没有秘密

translation.en: Look, if this is a waste of my time, I just want to know. Okay?
translation.zh: 如果我是在浪费时间 我只希望我能知道

translation.en: Define "waste."
translation.zh: -好吗？ -定义一下“浪费”

translation.en: You just did.
translation.zh: 你已经说出答案了

translation.en: Happy birthday.
translation.zh: 生日快乐

translation.en: No! Come-- Come on.
translation.zh: 别啊！拜托

translation.en: -It's over, Peter. -It-- It's…
translation.zh: -结束了 彼得 -这是…

translation.en: And she took the car.
translation.zh: 她自己坐车走了

translation.en: -Okay, did you take your antihistamine? -Check.
translation.zh: -你的抗组胺药带了吗？ -带了

translation.en: -Nasal spray? -Check.
translation.zh: -喷鼻剂？ -带了

translation.en: Good! Good to go!
translation.zh: 很好！可以出发了！

translation.en: -Morning, team! Hey! -[Debbie] Oh!
translation.zh: 早安 同志们！

translation.en: Ladybugs are kicking some ass in the garden out here.
translation.zh: 瓢虫在这花园里大显了一番身手

translation.en: You guys do the same. Have a great one.
translation.zh: -你们也是 祝今天愉快 -你也是 泽恩

translation.en: -[Debbie] Right back at you, Zen. -I'll be right here!
translation.zh: -你们也是 祝今天愉快 -你也是 泽恩 我就在这里！

translation.en: Or maybe, uh, over there.
translation.zh: 也可能去那边

translation.en: Hey, um, I talked to Alexander's mom about providing an alternative dessert
translation.zh: 嘿 我跟亚历山大的妈妈 说了一下在生日派对上

translation.en: at the birthday party because of all your allergies.
translation.zh: 提供另一种甜点的事 因为你会过敏

translation.en: Okay, don't forget-- You gotta be kidding me, Mom. That's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: -别忘了 -你在开玩笑吧 这太尴尬了 什么…

translation.en: Do you still hang out with Wade? Hi, Wade!
translation.zh: 你还在和韦德玩吗？嗨 韦德！

translation.en: -[Peter] Mom! No. -[Debbie] What?
translation.zh: -妈妈！别！ -干嘛？

translation.en: -What? He's one of my students! -Gosh, you're not a teacher.
translation.zh: -怎么了？他是我的学生！ -天啊 你又不是老师

translation.en: Technically, I work here. Let me get your lunch.
translation.zh: 我在这里工作 我把午餐拿给你

translation.en: Um, you guys used to hang out all the time.
translation.zh: 你们以前总在一起玩啊

translation.en: He used to come for sleepovers.
translation.zh: 他以前还会来家里过夜

translation.en: Here, let me put this in your bag. Didn't he pee on our sofa once?
translation.zh: 让我把这个塞进你书包里 他不是有次还尿在了你的沙发上吗？

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: What? He did!
translation.zh: 干嘛？他是尿啦！

translation.en: -Hey, girl. Hey. -Oh, my God, hey.
translation.zh: -嘿 姐们儿 -天啊 嘿

translation.en: Do you want to have some of my terrible office coffee?
translation.zh: 你要来点我办公室的破咖啡吗？

translation.en: -I have this. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh: -我有这个了 -好吧

translation.en: -But, yes, of course. -Well, let's do it.
translation.zh: -不过 好啊 当然好 -那走吧

translation.en: -Uh, so, are you packed? -[Debbie] Yes, I am packed.
translation.zh: 那你收拾好行李了吗？ 嗯 收拾好了

translation.en: I have to say, I am so glad you're finally taking a vacay.
translation.zh: 我不得不说 我真的很高兴你终于肯休假了

translation.en: What? A-- No, I am not going on vacay. I have explained this to you!
translation.zh: 什么？不 我不是去休假 我跟你解释过啦！

translation.en: I have to finish this program before the end of the year
translation.zh: 我必须在今年结束前完成这个课程

translation.en: so that I can apply for that open Senior Accounting position at the Regional School District.
translation.zh: 这样我才能申请 地区学区的高级会计职位

translation.en: Oh, I love it when you say a bunch of sexy words like that.
translation.zh: 我就喜欢你说一大堆 这种性感字眼时的样子

translation.en: Yeah, I just-- I need the money.
translation.zh: 是啊 我只是…我需要钱

translation.en: Jack's eczema medicine is only gonna be covered by my insurance
translation.zh: 我的保险只能报销杰克六个月的

translation.en: for the next six months, and then it's, like…
translation.zh: 湿疹药 之后就…

translation.en: -One thousand dollars. -Yes!
translation.zh: -一千美元 -就是啊！

translation.en: One thousand GD dollars a month! So, no, not a vacay.
translation.zh: 天杀的一个月一千美元！ 所以 不 这不是休假

translation.en: All right, all right. Well, I just hope that when you're in New York,
translation.zh: 好吧 我只希望你在纽约的时候

translation.en: you will take time to do something nice for yourself.
translation.zh: 能匀点时间做些让自己开心的事

translation.en: Maybe take a bath. Relax.
translation.zh: 也许泡个澡 放松一下

translation.en: That's what I love to do when I travel, I like to take a bath,
translation.zh: 我旅行的时候就喜欢这样 好好泡个澡 不用听 我的两个孩子嚷嚷：“我饿了！”

translation.en: and not hear either of my kids yell, "I'm hungry!"
translation.zh: 好好泡个澡 不用听 我的两个孩子嚷嚷：“我饿了！”

translation.en: Are they just always hungry?
translation.zh: 他们总是肚子饿吗？

translation.en: -Well, never feed 'em, so… -Ever?
translation.zh: -我从没给过他们食物 所以… -从来没有？

translation.en: Wait, why can't Jimmy come here to watch Jack?
translation.zh: 吉米为什么不能来这里照看杰克？

translation.en: It's peak climbing season. He has to be out there.
translation.zh: 现在是攀岩季 他必须出去

translation.en: Oh, my God, you are so nice about him.
translation.zh: 你对他也太好了

translation.en: If my ex was a mountain climber and spent ten months out of every year
translation.zh: 如果我的前任是个登山运动员 每年有十个月

translation.en: traveling the world with some hot 33-year-old covered in tattoos…
translation.zh: 都在全球旅行 身边跟着一个33岁满身刺青的性感…

translation.en: Have you been looking at her Instagram?
translation.zh: 你看过她的“照片墙”吗？

translation.en: You think I'm not gonna be looking at Jimmy's girlfriend's Instagram account?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会没看过 吉米女朋友的“照片墙”？

translation.en: I mean, what are we even doing? Who would I even be?
translation.zh: 那我们这是在干什么？ 我成什么人了？

translation.en: Look, it's fine. It works for him, it works for me.
translation.zh: 没关系的 他觉得没问题 我觉得没问题

translation.en: Besides, Jack loves hanging out with Scarlet.
translation.zh: 而且杰克喜欢和斯卡丽特在一起

translation.en: All right, well, I hope that you get what you want out of this trip.
translation.zh: 我希望这次旅行你能得偿所愿

translation.en: -Yes. -And what you need.
translation.zh: -是的 -以及得偿所需 你明白哦？

translation.en: You know, get your degree, find a man, come home,
translation.zh: 拿到你的学位 找个男人 回家

translation.en: and then remodel that ancient kitchen of yours.
translation.zh: 然后改造一下你那个老古董厨房

translation.en: I also think it's time to get layers in your hair. Layers, but not bangs.
translation.zh: 我还觉得你是时候给头发弄点层次了 层次 但是不要有刘海

translation.en: Bangs are for an emergency.
translation.zh: 刘海是紧急情况下才用的

translation.en: Wow, you really have all the answers to my life figured out.
translation.zh: 你真的掌握了我人生的所有答案

translation.en: Yeah, well, we're friends.
translation.zh: 我们是朋友

translation.en: Obviously, I have well-thought-out critiques of every choice you've ever made.
translation.zh: 我对你所做的每一个选择 都进行过深思熟虑的评判

translation.en: And all the fixes.
translation.zh: 还想了各种改良方案

translation.en: So, if you end up going on this Manhattan adventure
translation.zh: 所以如果你踏上这次曼哈顿之旅 给自己找到个帅哥

translation.en: and find yourself a hottie, might I suggest a manicure.
translation.zh: 所以如果你踏上这次曼哈顿之旅 给自己找到个帅哥 请容我建议你做个美甲

translation.en: Maybe get waxed. You know, spruce it up a bit.
translation.zh: 也许再脱脱毛 稍微收拾一下自己

translation.en: Waxed? Oh, my--
translation.zh: 脱毛？

translation.en: -Oh, "waxed." -Waxed.
translation.zh: 脱毛 -脱毛 -好吧 那是不可能的

translation.en: Oh, well, that's just not gonna happen.
translation.zh: -脱毛 -好吧 那是不可能的

translation.en: I beg of you, sir! Please, don't hurt me!
translation.zh: 求求你 先生！请不要伤害我！

translation.en: No, no. Okay, don't-- Don't judge that. Don't judge that.
translation.zh: 不 别评价刚刚那段 我再来一次

translation.en: I'm gonna do it again. Okay.
translation.zh: 不 别评价刚刚那段 我再来一次 好了

translation.en: I beg of you, sir, do not hurt me!
translation.zh: 求求你 先生！不要伤害我！

translation.en: Was that good?
translation.zh: 这样行吗？

translation.en: -Incredible. -Hey, Scarlet.
translation.zh: -非常了不起 -嘿 斯卡丽特

translation.en: -Hey, Deb! Um-- -What's going on?
translation.zh: -嘿 黛黛！ -什么情况？

translation.en: -Well, I got an audition! -What?
translation.zh: -我得到了试镜机会！ -什么？

translation.en: Ah, yeah! It's for a TV series set in the '20s about this serial killer,
translation.zh: 是的！是一部背景设定在1920年代 关于一个连环杀手的电视剧

translation.en: and I would play a maid who gets strangled by the lead.
translation.zh: 我要扮演一个被主角勒死的女佣

translation.en: Okay, can I try this out? Okay.
translation.zh: 行 我能试演一下吗？好嘞 开始了

translation.en: [in raspy voice] I beg of you, sir! Please don't hurt me!
translation.zh: 求求你 先生！请不要伤害我！

translation.en: [normally] I was being strangled. Did you get that? How was that?
translation.zh: 我刚刚是被勒住了 感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Honestly? Nailed it.
translation.zh: 实话吗？无可挑剔

translation.en: I'm probably not gonna get this anyway 'cause I don't get anything.
translation.zh: -反正我八成也拿不到这个角色 -世事难料

translation.en: Hey, you never know. Um, listen, did you get the emails that I sent
translation.zh: -反正我八成也拿不到这个角色 -世事难料 你收到我发的邮件了吗？

translation.en: about what to do with Jack while I'm out of town?
translation.zh: 关于我不在的时候怎么照顾杰克的？

translation.en: -Yep, yep, yep! We're on it! Right, Jack? -Yeah!
translation.zh: -嗯！我们正在处理！对吧 杰克？ -对！

translation.en: -Deb, I gotta say, I'm so happy for you. -Oh!
translation.zh: 黛黛 我必须说 我真替你开心

translation.en: It's, like, really cool and inspirational, this whole accounting thing or-- or whatever.
translation.zh: 你的这个会计还是什么的东西 非常棒 相当鼓舞人心

translation.en: It's so funny that you're a numbers person, 'cause I thought you liked books.
translation.zh: 你居然是个和数字打交道的人 这可真有趣 我还以为你喜欢看书呢

translation.en: So, I-- Why aren't you doing something with, like, booky-books?
translation.zh: 你为什么不做一些 小书书方面的事呢？

translation.en: Well, this degree is practical, which is what you have to be when you're a single mom.
translation.zh: 这个学位很实用 身为单亲妈妈 你必须这么做

translation.en: Right, right. Tragic.
translation.zh: 对 真悲惨

translation.en: [man] It's just such a waste.
translation.zh: 真是浪费

translation.en: "A waste."
translation.zh: “浪费”

translation.en: Look, we know that our consulting period with you is up, but--
translation.zh: 我们知道 我们和你的咨询期已经结束了

translation.en: Yeah, we were just hoping for a little more time to get to know you better.
translation.zh: 我们只是希望能再多一点时间 以便更深入地了解你

translation.en: Guys, you know me so well.
translation.zh: 两位 你们已经非常了解我了

translation.en: We spent so much time together over the last six months.
translation.zh: 过去的六个月 我们一起度过了很多时光

translation.en: Yeah, we did, and it's been…
translation.zh: 对 没错 而且一切都…棒极了

translation.en: -It's been amazing. -Amazing.
translation.zh: 对 没错 而且一切都…棒极了 非常棒

translation.en: Um, you know, we're just wondering, what happens next?
translation.zh: 我们只是想知道 接下来会怎么样？

translation.en: Next, I move on.
translation.zh: 接下来 我继续下一项工作

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 真的非常抱歉

translation.en: Come with us.
translation.zh: 加入我们吧

translation.en: We just-- We need a new CMO and it should be you, it's so obvious.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个新的首席营销官 这个职位应该给你 这是显而易见的

translation.en: -Yes! -Guys, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -没错！ -两位 抱歉

translation.en: It's just not on the table for me.
translation.zh: 这不在我的考虑之列

translation.en: I-- Look, look, don't be sad.
translation.zh: 不要难过

translation.en: -Nope. It's fine. Yeah. No, I-- -[Peter mutters]
translation.zh: 没有 没事 嗯

translation.en: This is just how it has to be.
translation.zh: 事情必须这样

translation.en: I don't know if I like you anymore.
translation.zh: 我不知道我还喜不喜欢你了

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, it's getting ugly.
translation.zh: 场面太难堪了

translation.en: I knew it was gonna get ugly.
translation.zh: 我就知道会变得很难堪

translation.en: You can, um, take my contact and erase it from your phone.
translation.zh: 你可以把我的联系方式 从你的手机里删除了

translation.en: [Peter] I don't have it in my phone. Well, then put it in your phone and then erase it. [exhales]
translation.zh: -我手机里没有存 -那就存进去然后再删了

translation.en: -He's sorry. We're sorry. He didn't-- -No, it's okay.
translation.zh: -他很抱歉 我们很抱歉 -没事 没关系

translation.en: Listen, Peter, if this is happening,
translation.zh: 听着 彼得 如果事情真是这样

translation.en: and it clearly is, I want to say to you, I hope you find what you're looking for.
translation.zh: 显然它就是这样的 我想说 我希望你能找到你在寻找的东西

translation.en: ♪ Let them make you a clown ♪
translation.zh: （生日快乐 彼得！ 公寓委员会的朋友们敬上）

translation.en: Happy birthday, buddy.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 兄弟

translation.en: -You're staring. -I know.
translation.zh: -你在盯着我看 -我知道

translation.en: I-- I'm just… I'm gonna miss you a whole lot.
translation.zh: 我只是…我会非常想你的

translation.en: Mom, you've been wanting to go do this thing for forever.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你一直都想完成这个课程的

translation.en: -I promise I'll be fine. -[knocking]
translation.zh: 我保证我不会有事的

translation.en: [in Cockney accent] I beg of you, sir, do not hurt me!
translation.zh: 求求你 先生 不要伤害我！

translation.en: [normally] Um, I got the part!
translation.zh: -我拿到角色了！ -什么？

translation.en: -What? -Yeah! Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 没错！你们能相信吗？

translation.en: [gasps] That's amazing! I know, I know! I fly to Vancouver tonight!
translation.zh: -太棒了！ -我知道！我今晚要飞去温哥华！

translation.en: And I'm there for two weeks, because even though I only have one line,
translation.zh: 我要在那里待两个星期 因为虽然我只有一句台词

translation.en: my character is in the background of all these really important scenes. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 但我的角色要充当 一些重要场景的背景 我的天呐

translation.en: Oh, my God. What is wrong with me?
translation.zh: 我的天呐 我是怎么了？ 我冲过来告诉你们这个消息 因为我非常爱你们

translation.en: I-- I rushed over here to tell you the news, because I love you guys so much,
translation.zh: 我冲过来告诉你们这个消息 因为我非常爱你们

translation.en: and I totally forgot that, of course, I'm supposed to be with Jack, because I'm a selfish butthole!
translation.zh: 但我却忘了我应该陪着杰克 因为我是个混蛋！

translation.en: -No! -Mm-mmm.
translation.zh: 才不是！

translation.en: [Scarlet] What am I gonna do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -It's fine. Totally fine. -[dishes clatter]
translation.zh: 没事的 一点事都没有

translation.en: Doesn't seem fine. Seems loud.
translation.zh: 似乎不像没事 感觉很大声

translation.en: I'll finish the program next year. They don't offer it again until then anyway.
translation.zh: 我明年再完成这个课程 在那之前他们不会再提供这种课程的

translation.en: Well, you seem kind of bummed out.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你看起来很沮丧

translation.en: It's okay. I'm an adult.
translation.zh: 没关系 我是个大人啦

translation.en: A big part of being an adult is being bummed out.
translation.zh: 沮丧是身为大人 非常重要的一个组成部分

translation.en: A lot of the time, really.
translation.zh: 很多时候都是

translation.en: That's something to look forward to.
translation.zh: 真让人期待呢

translation.en: Yeah, and that's just why you have to be careful and you have to be cautious all of the time.
translation.zh: 对 所以你必须时刻小心 保持警惕

translation.en: -You're not answering? -No, he's gonna try and lend me money.
translation.zh: -你不接吗？ -不接 他会试图借钱给我的

translation.en: -You don't know that. -Yes, I do.
translation.zh: -你又不知道 -我知道

translation.en: Hey, Peter. [Peter] Tell her I'm not trying to lend her money.
translation.zh: -嘿 彼得 -告诉她 我不会借钱给她的

translation.en: I said that. [Peter] I'm calling because I booked a flight, Jackity-Jack.
translation.zh: -我说过了 -我打电话来 是因为我订了张机票

translation.en: -Are you ready to hang? -Please, the nicknames.
translation.zh: -你准备好跟我一起玩了吗？ -拜托 昵称

translation.en: -Wait, what? -You're right.
translation.zh: -什么？ -你说得对

translation.en: I'm shooting blanks with the nicknames. We'll work on that when I get there.
translation.zh: 我取昵称的能力不过关 等我到了 我们再继续努力

translation.en: -Hey, Debbie! -Wait, what?
translation.zh: -嘿 黛比！ -什么？

translation.en: Oh, and I'm renting my own car,
translation.zh: 我租了一辆车 因为不管你开的是什么车

translation.en: 'cause God knows whatever hell show you're driving, I want no part of.
translation.zh: 我租了一辆车 因为不管你开的是什么车 -我都不想碰它 -什么？

translation.en: -Wait, what? -You're saying "Wait, what?" a lot. And it makes you sound kinda dumb.
translation.zh: 你说了好多次“什么” 这让你听起来不太聪明的样子

translation.en: -I just don't-- I don't understand. -Well, I'm coming to LA for a week.
translation.zh: 我不明白 我会去洛杉矶照顾杰克一个星期

translation.en: I'm gonna look after Jack, and you can stay here solo.
translation.zh: 我会去洛杉矶照顾杰克一个星期 -你可以自己待在这儿 -彼得 拜托

translation.en: Peter, come on.
translation.zh: -你可以自己待在这儿 -彼得 拜托

translation.en: You can't just drop everything to come and babysit.
translation.zh: 你不能丢下所有事跑来这儿带孩子

translation.en: You have a job and a life.
translation.zh: 你有自己的工作和生活

translation.en: I mean, I don't know about a life, but you have a job.
translation.zh: 我不确定生活 但你是有工作的

translation.en: [grunts] Actually, I have, uh, some time off between clients, so we're all good there.
translation.zh: 我在客户之间会有些空挡 所以一切都没问题

translation.en: It's not as much fun as us hanging out together,
translation.zh: 这样不像我们一起玩那么有趣

translation.en: but gets you what you need.
translation.zh: 这样不像我们一起玩那么有趣 但它符合你的需求

translation.en: Peter, taking care of Jack is actually a lot of work.
translation.zh: 彼得 照顾杰克是非常费事的

translation.en: It-- He's allergic to a billion things, like, he takes a bunch of medicine,
translation.zh: 他对无数的东西过敏 他要吃很多药

translation.en: and, honestly, he doesn't have a lot of friends right now.
translation.zh: 他对无数的东西过敏 他要吃很多药 而且老实说 他现在没什么朋友

translation.en: Let me help. I owe you.
translation.zh: -让我帮你 这是我欠你的 -欠我的？

translation.en: -Owe me? -Yes! Where was I when Jack was born?
translation.zh: -让我帮你 这是我欠你的 -欠我的？ 对啊！杰克出生的时候我在哪里？

translation.en: I was in London helping a Spanish bank launch a sister branch in Eastern Europe.
translation.zh: 我在伦敦 帮一家 西班牙银行在东欧开设姐妹分行

translation.en: But when my mom died, you drove from Los Angeles
translation.zh: 但我妈妈去世的时候 你从洛杉矶开车

translation.en: to freaking Ohio for the services.
translation.zh: 跑到俄亥俄州去帮忙

translation.en: And you picked me up from rehab not once, but twice.
translation.zh: 而且你不止一次 去康复中心接我 而是两次

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I-- I-- I know, I'm a really good friend,
translation.zh: 对 我知道 我是个非常好的朋友

translation.en: but I-- I didn't do any of those things expecting something in return.
translation.zh: 但我做那些的时候都没想要回报

translation.en: Of course you didn't, 'cause you're not a monster.
translation.zh: 你当然没有啦 因为你不是一个恶魔

translation.en: You need help. And I'm coming,
translation.zh: 你需要帮助 我这就来

translation.en: and that's that.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: [mutters] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: He's gonna be fine, right?
translation.zh: 他会没事的 对吧？

translation.en: Yes, it's only a week.
translation.zh: 是的 就一个星期而已

translation.en: It's only a week!
translation.zh: 就一个星期而已

translation.en: I'm hugging a pair of pants.
translation.zh: 我在拥抱一条裤子

translation.en: [Jack] Mom, come on! We're gonna be late!
translation.zh: 妈妈 快点！我们要迟到了！

translation.en: -Need help? -No, no.
translation.zh: -要帮忙吗？ -不用

translation.en: I have a method.
translation.zh: 我有办法

translation.en: That's how I do it. Okay.
translation.zh: -这就是我做事的方法 -好吧

translation.en: You know, they make these, uh, zippy, little four-wheelers now.
translation.zh: 他们现在开始生产 那种有四个小轮子的行李箱了

translation.en: You barely have to push 'em. They call 'em "spinners."
translation.zh: 你几乎不用推它 他们称其为“万向轮”

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -Yeah! All right. Hey.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的！

translation.en: Begonias while you're begone?
translation.zh: -干嘛？ -你不在的时候倍栽花？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Knock yourself out, Zen. All right, good. Safe travels.
translation.zh: -努力工作 泽恩 -好的 行 一路平安

translation.en: Thanks!
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: ♪ Safe travels, hope you make it ♪
translation.zh: 一路平安 希望你能成功抵达

translation.en: ♪ No… sudden cornfield stops… ♪
translation.zh: 不会忽然被玉米田拦停…

translation.en: [Debbie chuckles] Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you. I'll call you every day.
translation.zh: 我会想你的 我每天都会打电话给你

translation.en: -Okay? -All right.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -好啦

translation.en: [Zen] ♪ Safe travels, hope you make it ♪
translation.zh: 一路平安 希望你能成功抵达…

translation.en: -I love you! -Bye, Mama!
translation.zh: -我爱你！ -妈妈再见！

translation.en: ♪ Hope you're all right ♪
translation.zh: 愿你安好

translation.en: Leesh!
translation.zh: 小丽！

translation.en: -Oh, here's this guy. -[Peter] Look at you!
translation.zh: 这家伙来了 看看你！容光焕发！

translation.en: You look great!
translation.zh: 看看你！容光焕发！

translation.en: You look, like, the same!
translation.zh: 你一点都没变！

translation.en: Yeah, I know! It's spooky, isn't it?
translation.zh: 我知道！很恐怖 对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yeah. Uh…
translation.zh: -对！ -是啊

translation.en: -Oh, uh, do you want this? -Oh. I thought you might need it.
translation.zh: 你要这个吗？我想你可能需要它

translation.en: -You look good. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -你看起来不错 -谢谢

translation.en: You still got that tall, squared-jaw, long-eyelash vibe going on.
translation.zh: 高个子、方下巴、长睫毛的风采还在

translation.en: Some people like that.
translation.zh: 有些人就爱这个调调

translation.en: -It was never my thing, but… -Yup.
translation.zh: -从来不是我的菜 不过… -对

translation.en: Anyway, it was really nice of you to come out here to take care of Jack.
translation.zh: 总之 你能过来照顾杰克真是太好了

translation.en: Come on, it's no sweat. Honestly, I was between clients and, well…
translation.zh: 小事一桩 老实说 我刚好在客户间有空档 而且这就是几天的事 对吧？

translation.en: -It's a short-term project, right? -[bell rings]
translation.zh: 老实说 我刚好在客户间有空档 而且这就是几天的事 对吧？

translation.en: That's what I do. I get in, manage things, no muss, no fuss.
translation.zh: 我就是做这个的 加入进去 处理事务 从容不迫

translation.en: I have bad news. Kids are all muss and all fuss.
translation.zh: 我有个坏消息 小孩可都是棘手难缠的

translation.en: -Are they though? -Uh, yeah. -Very much so. -Oh.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -是的 千真万确

translation.en: -[girl] Give it back! -We'll see.
translation.zh: 等着瞧吧

translation.en: Those two, those are my girls.
translation.zh: 那两个是我女儿

translation.en: -[Peter] Okay. Oh, fun. They look fun. -[girls arguing]
translation.zh: 好吧 有意思 她们看起来挺有趣的

translation.en: Oh, there's Jack.
translation.zh: 杰克来了

translation.en: All right, I think I got this.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想我能搞定

translation.en: What's up, Jackie Gleason?
translation.zh: 你好吗 “杰基格里森”？

translation.en: Who or what is that?
translation.zh: 这是什么或者谁？

translation.en: No? All right, all right. Let's blow this popsicle stand, huh?
translation.zh: 不行？好吧 我们快离开这个冰棒摊吧

translation.en: What's a popsicle stand?
translation.zh: 那么冰棒摊？

translation.en: I am not entirely sure, to be honest.
translation.zh: 老实说 我也不太确定

translation.en: Hey, you want to drive?
translation.zh: -你想开车吗？ -不想

translation.en: -No. -You can drive the Porsche.
translation.zh: -你可以开这辆保时捷 -我不想开

translation.en: -I don't want to drive-- -It was this or a Lamborgh--
translation.zh: -你可以开这辆保时捷 -我不想开 能选的只有这个和兰博基尼 你更愿意开“莲花”？

translation.en: I know, you don't like the Porsche. You'd rather drive the Lotus?
translation.zh: 能选的只有这个和兰博基尼 你更愿意开“莲花”？

translation.en: -What? -All right, well…
translation.zh: -干嘛？ -好吧

translation.en: Next time, I'll bring the Lotus, and you can drive it.
translation.zh: 下次 我开莲花过来 你可以开那个

translation.en: [Jack] What's a Lotus?
translation.zh: “莲花”是什么？

translation.en: My mom hates convertibles, you know? She says they roll over too easily.
translation.zh: 我妈妈讨厌敞篷车 你知道吗？ 她说它们太容易翻车了

translation.en: Yeah, well, they're also awesome, so that negates the rolling part.
translation.zh: 它们也很帅 这抵消了翻车的部分

translation.en: Hey, let me ask you a question. Those kids back there,
translation.zh: 我问你个问题 刚刚那些对你视若无睹的小孩 是什么情况？

translation.en: they were blowing you off. What was that about?
translation.zh: 刚刚那些对你视若无睹的小孩 是什么情况？

translation.en: Look, man. I was a 13-year-old boy once, all right?
translation.zh: 我也曾是13岁的小男生 好吗？

translation.en: And I know I'm pretty cool now,
translation.zh: 我知道我现在挺酷的

translation.en: but when I was 13 I was basically a walking Adam's apple with a bowl cut
translation.zh: 但我13岁的时候 我基本上 就是一个顶着锅盖头的行走的喉结

translation.en: and a tattered copy of Catcher in the Rye under my arm, so…
translation.zh: 腋下总是 夹着一本残破的《麦田守望者》

translation.en: Plus, I didn't have a dad.
translation.zh: 而且 我没有爸爸

translation.en: He bailed on me when I was 13,
translation.zh: 他在我13岁的时候抛弃了我

translation.en: then he died three years later, drunk in a ditch.
translation.zh: 三年后 他因为醉酒在阴沟里死了

translation.en: He was walking along the side of the road and he just went "bloop."
translation.zh: 他在路边走着 忽然“噗通”一声

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: So, seriously, whatever you're going through, I've probably seen worse, so you can hit me with it.
translation.zh: 不管你正在经历什么 我大概见识过更惨的 所跟我说说吧

translation.en: -Well, give it to me, Jack Be Nimble. -I don't even understand that one.
translation.zh: -给我透露点消息 “活泼敏捷的杰克” -这个我不懂

translation.en: Look, I'm still workshopping, okay?
translation.zh: 我还在继续努力 好吗？

translation.en: It's because of hockey.
translation.zh: 是因为冰球

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Wade and I were friends, and we used to skate at the rink together,
translation.zh: 韦德和我曾经是朋友 我们以前一起滑冰

translation.en: but now he plays on the team and I can't.
translation.zh: 但现在他加入了球队 而我不能去

translation.en: So he hangs out with Evan, who does.
translation.zh: 所以他就和球队的埃文一起玩

translation.en: So we just stopped hanging at all.
translation.zh: 而我们再也不一起玩了

translation.en: Whoa, wait, you play hockey? Well, Debbie never told me that.
translation.zh: 慢着 等一下 你会打冰球？ 黛比从没跟我说过

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I can't play basketball 'cause I'm allergic to the gym,
translation.zh: 我不能打篮球 因为我对体育馆过敏

translation.en: and I can't play baseball 'cause I'm allergic to grass.
translation.zh: 我不能打棒球 因为我对草地过敏

translation.en: Wait- I don't understand why you can't play on the team
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么不能 和韦德以及他的奸诈朋友一起打球

translation.en: with Wade and his weaselly friend. Oh, I'm sorry. He--
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么不能 和韦德以及他的奸诈朋友一起打球 抱歉

translation.en: He's probably not weaselly, but, like, he's got a weasel face.
translation.zh: 他也许并不奸诈 但他的脸就是很奸诈

translation.en: You know? So, but-- Why can't you play on the team?
translation.zh: 你懂哦？ 你为什么不能加入球队？

translation.en: I'm too small. Mom says it's too dangerous.
translation.zh: 太矮了 妈妈说这样太危险了

translation.en: I cannot believe your mom didn't tell me about this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你妈妈没跟我说这件事

translation.en: Like, she tells me everything.
translation.zh: 她什么都会跟我说的

translation.en: But do you? Tell her everything?
translation.zh: 但你会吗？什么都会告诉她？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: [Peter] I never understood why Debbie
translation.zh: 我不明白黛比为什么

translation.en: decided to buy a house on the side of a whole entire hill.
translation.zh: 会决定买一栋在山坡上的房子

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I suppose you get used to it after a while, huh?
translation.zh: 我猜你已经习惯了吧？

translation.en: No. It continues to suck.
translation.zh: 没有 它依然非常糟糕

translation.en: Who lived here before you, like, an alpaca?
translation.zh: 在你们之前是谁住在这儿 羊驼吗？

translation.en: Yeah! Yo, Jack.
translation.zh: 耶！哟 杰克

translation.en: You're the guy-- You're the dude that's, uh, gonna be hanging with, uh, Jack.
translation.zh: 你就是要陪着杰克的家伙

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -I'm Zen.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你 -我是泽恩

translation.en: Yeah, like the Buddhism.
translation.zh: 对 像佛教那个禅

translation.en: I live through the gate there, and, uh, I'm independently wealthy
translation.zh: 我住在门的那边 因为一次科技收购 我变得很有钱

translation.en: due to a tech buyout.
translation.zh: 因为一次科技收购 我变得很有钱

translation.en: -Of course. -I surf in the AM.
translation.zh: -当然 -我早上会去冲浪

translation.en: Spend the rest of the day here in Debbie's garden.
translation.zh: 剩下的时间就在黛比的花园里

translation.en: -What about your yard? -My yard?
translation.zh: -那你的院子呢？ -我的院子？

translation.en: Oh, I don't do my yard, I got a guy for that.
translation.zh: 我不用管我的院子 我雇了个人负责打理 他就在那儿

translation.en: -[man] Yeah? -[laughs] Yeah!
Dude, he's so funny.
translation.zh: 天啊 他可真有趣

translation.en: He's from Spokane.
translation.zh: 他来自斯波坎市

translation.en: Okay. Well, it was nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 好吧 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Okay. -[Jack] Bye, Zen.
translation.zh: -好了 -再见 泽恩

translation.en: All right, back at it. [grunts]
translation.zh: 好了 继续吧

translation.en: -[Jack] You didn't know about Zen? -[Peter] Nope.
translation.zh: -你不知道泽恩？ -不知道

translation.en: So the whole thing where you and Mom tell each other everything--
translation.zh: 那你和我妈无话不说这件事…

translation.en: Yeah, no, we're not gonna-- That's grown-up talk.
translation.zh: 是 不 我们不会… 那是大人之间的交谈

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Did she stay up all night doing this?
translation.zh: 她是通宵弄的这些吗？

translation.en: Your mom's crazy.
translation.zh: 你妈妈疯了

translation.en: [emphatically] I am well aware.
translation.zh: 我太清楚了

translation.en: All right, let's, um…
translation.zh: 好了 我们…

translation.en: [Debbie on phone] Oh, hey! I made it. I'm in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 嘿！我到了 我在布鲁克林了

translation.en: Are-- Are you home yet? Did you see my Post-Its?
translation.zh: 你们到家了吗？ 看到我的便利贴了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, they're kinda hard to miss, Deb. -Okay.
translation.zh: -看到了 它们很难被忽视吧 黛黛 -很好

translation.en: The most important thing is that you feed him breakfast,
translation.zh: 最重要的是给他做早餐、

translation.en: then you pack his lunch, and then you pick up his prescriptions on the way to school.
translation.zh: 准备中饭、 以及去学校的路上帮他去拿药

translation.en: Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Oh, and the other most important thing is that you get the list
translation.zh: 另一个重要的东西 是他会过敏的物品清单

translation.en: of things that he's allergic to. It's right by the coffee maker.
translation.zh: 另一个重要的东西 是他会过敏的物品清单 就在咖啡机旁边 不好意思

translation.en: -Oh! Excuse me. -Oh, wow. Laminated. Nice.
translation.zh: 就在咖啡机旁边 不好意思 还覆膜了 真不错 上面写着“紧急”

translation.en: -Oh, this one says "urgent." -Yeah.
translation.zh: 还覆膜了 真不错 上面写着“紧急” 是的 我忘了给不含坚果的 坚果酱贴标签 但它就在那里

translation.en: And I forgot to label the nut-free nut butter.
translation.zh: 是的 我忘了给不含坚果的 坚果酱贴标签 但它就在那里

translation.en: But it's in there. It's in the… Do you--
translation.zh: 是的 我忘了给不含坚果的 坚果酱贴标签 但它就在那里 -它在…嗯 -我不知道那是什么

translation.en: -Yeah. -I don't know what that is.
translation.zh: -它在…嗯 -我不知道那是什么

translation.en: Oh, and Jack, Jack, have you started your history paper?
translation.zh: 杰克 你开始写历史课的论文了吗？

translation.en: Already started it.
translation.zh: -已经开始了 -这说明他什么都没做

translation.en: Okay, that means he's done nothing, Peter. You have to remind him.
translation.zh: -已经开始了 -这说明他什么都没做 你得提醒他 他必须选一个论题

translation.en: Okay, he has to pick a thesis.
translation.zh: 你得提醒他 他必须选一个论题

translation.en: He's doing the Spanish-American War, which is, I think, against Spain.
translation.zh: 他正在研究“美西战争” 我想是跟西班牙打吧

translation.en: -Yeah, Deb? -I'm not sure. -Jack is okay. -Oh, hi! [laughs]
translation.zh: -我也不确定 -好了 黛黛 杰克没事

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. There are so many people here. It's crazy.
translation.zh: 这里的人好多啊 太夸张了

translation.en: We're gonna figure out dinner.
translation.zh: 我们会想想晚饭吃什么

translation.en: Oh, no, you don't have to worry about it, because I left dinner.
translation.zh: 不用 你不用操心这个 因为我准备了晚餐

translation.en: O-- Open the freezer.
translation.zh: 打开冰箱

translation.en: -[Peter] Wait, this also says "urgent." -Jack loves those casseroles.
translation.zh: 等等 这上面也写着“紧急” 杰克超爱吃砂锅菜

translation.en: -[mouthing] -You know, I could-- I could buy dinner.
translation.zh: 那个 晚饭我还请得起的

translation.en: Peter, I know that you have a lot of money,
translation.zh: 我知道你很有钱

translation.en: but I really don't want you getting him take-out, and-- and other things that are fancy.
translation.zh: 但我真的不希望 你让他吃外卖和其他奢华的东西

translation.en: Yeah, okay! Homework, and then frozen… [mutters] …for dinner.
translation.zh: 行 好的！作业以及冷冻的…晚餐

translation.en: I know there's something else I forgot to tell you.
translation.zh: 还有件事我忘了跟你说

translation.en: Shoot, I forgot what I forgot to tell you.
translation.zh: 我想不起来我忘记告诉你什么了…

translation.en: Debbie, stop.
translation.zh: 黛比 够了

translation.en: T-- Take a breath.
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: Look around.
translation.zh: 看看四周

translation.en: Yeah, enjoy it.
translation.zh: 对 好好享受吧

translation.en: -Call us later. -Okay.
translation.zh: -晚点再联系我们 -好的

translation.en: -You allergic to Mexican food? -No.
translation.zh: -你对墨西哥菜过敏吗？ -不过敏

translation.en: Excuse me, pardon me.
translation.zh: 不好意思 抱歉

translation.en: Uh, um, excuse me, I'm gonna go to Peter Coleman's.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我要去彼得科尔曼家

translation.en: You know, they make those with four wheels now.
translation.zh: 话说 他们现在已经出四个轮子的了

translation.en: They're called "spinners."
translation.zh: 它们叫“万向轮”

translation.en: -[elevator bell rings] -Right, so…
translation.zh: 好的 所以…

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天呐

translation.en: This is gorgeous.
translation.zh: 这也太美了

translation.en: Oh, my God. [sighs heavily]
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: What!?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: By color? Really?
translation.zh: 按颜色？真的吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God, Peter.
translation.zh: 天呐 彼得

translation.en: Wait, where are the handles? How do you even open this?
translation.zh: 等等 拉手在哪儿呢？ 这个要怎么打开？

translation.en: What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么啊？

translation.en: That's just sad.
translation.zh: 真令人悲伤

translation.en: Peter. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 彼得

translation.en: They still have stickers on them.
translation.zh: 标签都还在上面

translation.en: Twenty-five dollars for a glass? Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 一个玻璃杯要25美元？天呀

translation.en: Peter. Just because you can doesn't mean you should.
translation.zh: 彼得 你有这实力 不代表你应该这样

translation.en: Okay… what should we do?
translation.zh: 好了 我们要做什么呢？

translation.en: Well, I have homework that I should probably do.
translation.zh: 我大概应该做作业了

translation.en: God, I just got here!
translation.zh: 我才刚到这里！

translation.en: What-- It's-- [blabbers] This is our night!
translation.zh: 这是我们的夜晚！这是我们的时刻！

translation.en: It's our occasion! We're having a special-- We're occasioning!
translation.zh: 这是我们的夜晚！这是我们的时刻！ 我们正在时刻着！

translation.en: -It's-- That's not a word. -It is now!
translation.zh: -没有这种词 -现在有了！

translation.en: Let's-- We can-- We can watch a movie.
translation.zh: 我们来…我们可以看部电影

translation.en: [Jack] Yeah, no.
translation.zh: 嗯 不

translation.en: We have three remotes. Uh, can I see that?
translation.zh: 我们有三个遥控器 我能看看那个吗？

translation.en: This one controls the TV and it makes sure the DVD player isn't on.
translation.zh: 这个是遥控电视的 这个确保DVD机不会被打开

translation.en: -This one controls the sound. -Oh, yeah, I was gonna do that. It's all volume.
translation.zh: 这个是控制音量的 只管音量

translation.en: This one controls the cable to make sure the Wi-Fi is working.
translation.zh: 这个控制网线 确保无线网络能用

translation.en: And, oh, yeah. This one also is the receiver.
translation.zh: 这个也是个接收器

translation.en: Got that sequence. But I'm not supposed to watch TV while I eat.
translation.zh: 但吃饭的时候我不应该看电视的

translation.en: And never before homework.
translation.zh: 而且写完作业前是绝对不能看的

translation.en: You poor child.
translation.zh: 你这个可怜的孩子

translation.en: Had I known what was going on in this house,
translation.zh: 如果我早知道这个家里的情况

translation.en: I would have come a lot sooner.
translation.zh: 我老早就过来了

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You know, my mom always says you're kinda irresponsible.
translation.zh: 我妈妈总是说你挺没有责任心的

translation.en: She calls you, "a rolling stone that gathers no moss." -[laughs] -Whatever that is.
translation.zh: 她说你“滾石不生苔 來去真自在”什么的

translation.en: She does, huh?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she also says you're terrible with women.
translation.zh: 是的 她还说你对女人很糟糕

translation.en: Ah. [chuckles] Your mom!
translation.zh: 你妈妈！

translation.en: But I'm psyched you're here, 'cause you're chill.
translation.zh: 但是你在这儿我很开心 因为你挺随和

translation.en: Chill.
translation.zh: 随和

translation.en: Oh, stop. Stop everything. That's the movie we're gonna watch.
translation.zh: 停 全都打住吧 我们就看这部电影

translation.en: -Alien? -Yeah, have you seen it?
translation.zh: -《异形》？ -对 你看过吗？

translation.en: -No, is it scary? -[in gruff voice] It's terrifying.
translation.zh: 没有 吓人吗？ 非常恐怖

translation.en: Cool!
translation.zh: 好啊！

translation.en: Oh, no, that's not…
translation.zh: 不 这不是…

translation.en: Why is it so cold in here?
translation.zh: 这儿为什么这么冷呢？

translation.en: Heat…
translation.zh: 暖气…

translation.en: Heat!
translation.zh: 暖气！

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry, I-- I can't hear you.
translation.zh: -嗨！ -抱歉 我听不见你说话

translation.en: You just have to point at the sensor.
translation.zh: 你只需要对准传感器

translation.en: -[music stops] -Oh, my God. Thank you.
translation.zh: 天啊 谢谢你

translation.en: Hi, I'm Debbie.
translation.zh: 嗨 我叫黛比

translation.en: Wait a second. Are you the Debbie? Peter talks about you all the time!
translation.zh: 慢着 你就是那个黛比吗？ 彼得总是提起你！

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, I guess that's me. -[chuckles] Um, who are you?
translation.zh: 对 我猜就是我吧 你是哪位？

translation.en: I'm Minka, and I am a skosh embarrassed.
translation.zh: 我是明卡 我有一点点尴尬

translation.en: I thought Peter was here and I am not wearing anything under this.
translation.zh: 我以为彼得在这里 我这衣服里面什么都没穿

translation.en: -[Debbie] I figured that. -Yeah, I feel like an idiot.
translation.zh: -我猜到了 -是啊 我像个傻瓜一样

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 不用担心

translation.en: We've all done the thing where we knock on the door half-naked for some g…
translation.zh: 大家都有过半裸着去敲门的经历

translation.en: So you and Peter are…
translation.zh: 那么你跟彼得是…

translation.en: We were. We used to.
translation.zh: 曾经是 我们是过去式了

translation.en: We broke up after six months and then he started dating this woman Becca,
translation.zh: 我们交往六个月后就分手了 然后他开始和贝卡交往

translation.en: but through the careful study of her socials, I figured out they broke up.
translation.zh: 不过通过对她的社交媒体账号 的仔细研究 我发现他们分手了

translation.en: So I thought I would come over and…
translation.zh: 所以我想着可以过来…

translation.en: -So that is how you sit there. -By the way, where is Peter?
translation.zh: -原来那个是要这样坐 -顺便问一句 彼得去哪儿了？

translation.en: Oh, he's staying at my place in LA.
translation.zh: 他在我洛杉矶的家里 而我要在这儿待几天

translation.en: -And I'm just here for a few days. -Cute!
translation.zh: 他在我洛杉矶的家里 而我要在这儿待几天 真好！我能请你喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Can I buy you a drink?

translation.en: No ulterior motive.
translation.zh: 没有其他目的

translation.en: I will not ask you why Peter is so emotionally, like, broken.

translation.en: Oh, I would love that, but, um, I'm starting classes tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我很乐意 但我明天要开始上课了

translation.en: I have to get up early. I'm doing this program, and…
translation.zh: 我得早起 我在读一个课程 也许下次吧

translation.en: -Anyway, maybe some other time. -Yeah, sure!
translation.zh: 我得早起 我在读一个课程 也许下次吧 好啊 没问题！

translation.en: I will take you to the Brownstone Club. That's where Peter and I met.
translation.zh: 我带你去布朗石俱乐部 我和彼得就是在那里认识的

translation.en: You know, you are great.
translation.zh: 你人真不错

translation.en: I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你

translation.en: I dig this whole sexy, Gen-X, Earth Mama thing you've got going on.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你这种X世代地球妈妈的感觉

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢！

translation.en: [Peter] You're gonna party with Minka?
translation.zh: 你要跟明卡出去玩？

translation.en: She asked if maybe I wanted to go for a drink sometime.
translation.zh: 她问我要不要找时间去喝一杯

translation.en: -[Peter] Oh, fancy! -Right. -Hey, what are you guys doing tonight? -[Peter] Um…
translation.zh: -真不错！ -你们俩今晚要做什么？

translation.en: -What did we do? Um, nothing special. -Oh, is he there?
translation.zh: 我们做了什么？没什么特别的 他在吗？他想跟我说话吗？

translation.en: -Does he want to talk to me? -[yells]
translation.zh: 他在吗？他想跟我说话吗？

translation.en: Uh, he's-- he's actually doing his homework right now, so…
translation.zh: 他现在正在写作业 所以…

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh! Oh, that's good.
translation.zh: 那很好啊

translation.en: Hey, uh, by the way, are you aware that there is a gentleman and his butt crack
translation.zh: 话说 你知不知道 有位露着屁股的先生

translation.en: in your yard all ding-dong day?
translation.zh: 整天都在你家花园里？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's Zen. He just-- He's around a lot.
translation.zh: 知道 那是泽恩 他总是在那儿 因为他把花园打理得非常好

translation.en: It's, uh-- You know, he does a really great job with the garden
translation.zh: 他总是在那儿 因为他把花园打理得非常好

translation.en: and-- and so I just let him do his thing. Um, did I not mention Zen?
translation.zh: 所以他要做什么我就让他做了 我没跟你说过泽恩吗？

translation.en: Yeah. No, no, you failed to mention that there is a man living in your yard.
translation.zh: 对 没有 你没有提过 有个男的住在你的花园里

translation.en: Um, Peter, I just want to say thank you. This place is amazing.
translation.zh: 彼得 我想跟你说声谢谢 你家简直太棒了

translation.en: -It's just comfortable and… -[chuckles] Really?
translation.zh: -非常舒适而且… -真的吗？

translation.en: -No, not really. It's very, very empty. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 不 不是真的 这里太空了

translation.en: It looks like somebody stole all your stuff.
translation.zh: 感觉像进过贼一样

translation.en: Yeah, well, if they did, they brought it all here, 'cause you have all the stuff.
translation.zh: 要有贼的话 他们一定把东西 带到这儿来了 你家什么都有

translation.en: Like, literally, all the things that are, were, and ever shall be, are here.
translation.zh: 所有现在、过去、 和未来的东西应有尽有

translation.en: Oh, really? Well, you don't have a photo or a knickknack.
translation.zh: 是吗？你连一张照片或小摆设都没有

translation.en: I don't do knickknacks. I don't buy them, like, ever. I have nixed the knickknacks.
translation.zh: 我不弄什么小摆设 我不会买那些 我了结了所有的小摆设

translation.en: Oh, by the way, your books are all color-coded, which is…

translation.en: I mean, I knew New York had changed you, but that one hit me hard.
translation.zh: 我知道纽约改变了你 但这一点让我大为震撼

translation.en: Yeah, my decorator did that.
translation.zh: -是我的设计师弄的 -真恶心

translation.en: That's just gross, and I can't believe you said it out loud.
translation.zh: -是我的设计师弄的 -真恶心 真不敢相信这种话你居然说得出口 你没有洛杉矶带去的任何纪念品吗？

translation.en: Also, you don't have any mementos from LA?

translation.en: No! You know my policy on mentos.
translation.zh: 没有！你知道我对纪念品的原则啦

translation.en: So, let me ask you a question.
translation.zh: 问你个问题

translation.en: I mean, I'm not trying to pry, but what happened with Minka?
translation.zh: 我不是想窥探你的隐私 但你跟明卡是怎么了？

translation.en: She seems like she's your type. She's so silky and sleek.
translation.zh: 她看起来是你喜欢的类型 她皮肤滑嫩又光鲜亮丽

translation.en: Okay, what? She's not an otter.
translation.zh: 她又不是水獭

translation.en: -What happened? -I don't know. I don't--
translation.zh: -发生了什么事？ -我不知道

translation.en: You know me. I probably did something to screw it up.

translation.en: Oh, stop it.
translation.zh: 得了吧

translation.en: Yeah, well, let the fossil record show that I am terrible with women.
translation.zh: 有古早记录明示 我不擅长跟女人相处

translation.en: In-- In fact, some would say that I am "a rolling stone that gathers no moss."
translation.zh: 有人会说我 “滾石不生苔 來去真自在”

translation.en: Uh, what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, just so you know, your kid's a sieve, all right?

translation.en: So everything you've ever said about me, I'm about to hear.
translation.zh: 所以你说过的关于我的话 我都会知道

translation.en: Okay, I didn't-- I didn't say it like that.
translation.zh: 我不是那样说的

translation.en: -Okay, yeah, I-- I did. I said that. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好吧 我说了 是我说的 -对 我很确定

translation.en: -But I think he misunderstood me. -Yeah, I'm sure. Right, look.
translation.zh: -但我觉得他误解了我的意思 -现在很晚了

translation.en: It's getting late out there. You should go to sleep.
translation.zh: -但我觉得他误解了我的意思 -现在很晚了 你该去睡觉了

translation.en: And 'cause I have a list of things that's a mile long
translation.zh: 而我还有张某个疯子留给我的

translation.en: that was left here for me to do by a crazy person.
translation.zh: 一千米长的清单要去完成

translation.en: [laughs] "Goodnight," said the crazy person.
translation.zh: 一千米长的清单要去完成 晚安 替我跟杰克说声再见 我们之后网上见

translation.en: Say bye to Jack. And I'll see you later on the interwebs.
translation.zh: 晚安 替我跟杰克说声再见 我们之后网上见

translation.en: I'll find you later!
translation.zh: -我之后再联系你！ -晚安

translation.en: -Goodnight. -Bye.
translation.zh: 拜拜

translation.en: So? Did I scar you for life?

translation.en: Who cares? That was dope! My mom would've never let me watch that.
translation.zh: 谁在乎？这太好看了！ 我妈妈永远都不会让我看这个的

translation.en: Do I look like your mom?
translation.zh: 我看起来像是你妈吗？

translation.en: For the love of God. You can't…
translation.zh: 救命啊 你不能…

translation.en: "Peter."
translation.zh: “彼得”

translation.en: "Thank."
translation.zh: “非常”

translation.en: "You."
"So."
"Much." [laughs]
"Don't screw up my kid."

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 行

translation.en: Oh, that's so sweet!
translation.zh: （课程结束后记得开酒！P） 你好贴心！

translation.en: [Peter] "He's allergic to all nuts, most legumes,
translation.zh: 他对所有坚果都过敏 大部分的豆类、杏仁、 开心果、腰果、碧根果、夏威夷果、

translation.en: almonds, pistachios, cashews, pecans, macadamias,
translation.zh: 大部分的豆类、杏仁、 开心果、腰果、碧根果、夏威夷果、

translation.en: "Sunflower butter."

translation.en: Not a nut. Okay.

translation.en: Hey!

translation.en: I'm just… I gotta…

translation.en: Holy shit.

translation.en: Gross.

translation.en: These neti pots, and packed lunches,

translation.en: breakfasts, age-appropriate movies?

translation.en: Okay, and my-- my work here is very simple.

translation.en: It's to teach you to tell a story to other people about you
translation.zh: 就是教会你跟别人讲述你的故事

translation.en: that is better than the story that you tell yourself.

translation.en: 'Cause the stories we tell ourselves are very limiting.

translation.en: -I'm not following. What do you mean? -Okay, example.

translation.en: Look, let's take someone we both know, your mom.

translation.en: -Okay. -Your mom is the smartest person I know.
translation.zh: -好的 -你妈妈是我认识的最聪明的人

translation.en: Okay? When we first met, she was extremely ambitious.
translation.zh: 我们刚认识的时候 她充满了雄心壮志

translation.en: She wanted to be an editor, or whatever, but then over time,
translation.zh: 她想成为一个编辑之类的 但随着时间推移

translation.en: she started to believe that she had to be practical,
translation.zh: 她开始相信自己必须实际一些

translation.en: and she had to be sensible, and that is the story that she told herself.

translation.en: "Be responsible."

translation.en: -So that's not your story? -No, co--

translation.en: Do you always answer a question to a question with a question?

translation.en: Okay, look, in the beginning of a rebrand,

translation.en: I like to do a thing called a "global realignment," all right?

translation.en: And that is a gesture to the world, in your case, Wade and Weasel Face…

translation.en: Evan, of what you have to offer.

translation.en: These are tickets to a luxury box.

translation.en: So we're gonna rebrand the word "bribing" with "incentivization."

translation.en: That's not a word.

translation.en: That's kind of sketch.

translation.en: Now you're getting it. There you go, "sketch."

translation.en: I was like, "Enough!" You know? Okay, follow me.

translation.en: [Wade] So funny. You ran, like, right into the practice station.
translation.zh: 太好笑了 你直接穿过了练习站

translation.en: Dude, it's not my fault the lace on my right skate snapped!
translation.zh: 这不是我的错 我溜冰鞋的鞋带断了！

translation.en: Whoa! Look at these!
translation.zh: 看看这些！

translation.en: -Dude! Jelly beans. -I love those! Those are my favorite!
translation.zh: -老兄！糖豆 -我超爱这个！它们是我的最爱！

translation.en: Dude, I think this is the cinnamon one that's super spicy.
translation.zh: -我猜这个是辣肉桂味的 -是吗？

translation.en: -Really? -You ever had the cinnamon Jolly Rancher?
translation.zh: 你吃过肉桂味的“杰瑞快乐牧场”吗？

translation.en: -The spicy one? -Yeah. Oh! I love those cinnamon… spicy ones!
translation.zh: -吃过 -我超爱肉桂口味的！

translation.en: That's so spicy. I'm good. I don't really like those ones.
translation.zh: 好辣啊 我不太喜欢这个

translation.en: Hey, hey, none of this stuff is on the allergy list, so you're good to go.
translation.zh: 这些东西全都不在过敏清单上 所以你可以放心吃

translation.en: So just go nuts, have at it.
translation.zh: 尽情享用…不会吃到任何坚果

translation.en: -Without eating any nuts. -[Wade] I think that's actually licorice.
translation.zh: 尽情享用…不会吃到任何坚果 -我觉得这个是甘草的 -他们为什么不跟我说话？

translation.en: [Jack] Why aren't they talking to me?
translation.zh: -我觉得这个是甘草的 -他们为什么不跟我说话？

translation.en: -[boys] Dots! -[Peter] They will!
translation.zh: -点！ -他们会的！

translation.en: They will. Don't worry about it. Let's go.
translation.zh: 不用担心 来吧

translation.en: We'll, hey, get a jersey or something. Let's get our kit on. Let's go. Go, Kings!
translation.zh: 拿件运动衫什么的 把装备穿上 加油 国王队！

translation.en: [Minka] Okay, I need a drink.
translation.zh: 好了 我需要喝一杯

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, yes. Let's have a drink!
translation.zh: 没错！我们去喝一杯吧！

translation.en: -[Minka] For one, I'm so thirsty. -I know!
translation.zh: -其中一个原因 我渴死了 -我知道！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Debbie] Wait a second. The-- These people look really fancy.
translation.zh: 等一下 这些人好像穿得华丽

translation.en: [Minka] Yeah, you have to be someone or know someone, and I'm both.
translation.zh: 你必须是个有头有脸的人 或者认识有头有脸的人 我两者都是

translation.en: And also kind of neither. That's what's great about me.
translation.zh: 同时又都不是 这就是我的优点

translation.en: Uh, I don't think I fit in here.
translation.zh: 我觉得我不太适合这里

translation.en: I mean, obviously. But you're with me. Come on.
translation.zh: 这很明显 但你和我在一起嘛 走吧

translation.en: Thank you, Petra!
translation.zh: 谢谢 佩特拉！

translation.en: By the way, we do not have to talk about Peter.
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 我们可以不用谈论彼得

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, okay. Got it.
translation.zh: 好的 明白

translation.en: -Yeah! -I mean, he had it-- -He had it at the start, right? -Dude!
translation.zh: -他从一开始就占了优势 -老兄！

translation.en: -He literally had it-- -Guys, guys! Did you see that last rally?
translation.zh: -他真的很占优势… -两位 你们看到最后那次拉锯了吗？

translation.en: That was crazy, huh? That was, like-- That was sketch!
translation.zh: 太刺激了 对吧？超级棒槌！

translation.en: Or as the Canadians would say, that was sketch, eh?
translation.zh: 或者加拿大人会说 刚刚超棒槌 哦？

translation.en: What is he talking about?
translation.zh: 他在说什么呢？

translation.en: -[Minka] Just be conscious of-- -[server] All right.
translation.zh: -请注意… -好吧

translation.en: Manhattan Maiden for you.
translation.zh: 您的“曼哈顿少女”

translation.en: And the Garden Glory for you.
translation.zh: 还有您的“花园荣耀”

translation.en: -Enjoy! -Thank you. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -请慢用！ -谢谢

translation.en: Am I supposed to drink it or water it? So how did you and Peter meet again?
translation.zh: -我应该喝了它还是给它浇浇水？ -你跟彼得是怎么认识的？

translation.en: Is this the part where we don't talk about Peter? -Mm-hmm. -Okay.
translation.zh: 这就是我们不聊彼得的部分吗？好吧

translation.en: [Minka] This is that part.
translation.zh: 就是这个部分

translation.en: Well, short story, we hooked up once, and then he bailed, and we became friends.
translation.zh: 说来话短 我们上过一次床 然后他逃走了 而我们变成了朋友

translation.en: And you married someone else.
translation.zh: 然后你嫁给了别人

translation.en: -Mm, Jimmy the mountain climber. -[Minka] Mm.
translation.zh: 登山者吉米

translation.en: Which is funny, 'cause at the time, he felt like a safe choice for me.
translation.zh: 这挺有意思的 因为当时 他对我来说似乎是个安全的选择

translation.en: -Mm. -He was just very sure about me.
translation.zh: 他对我非常笃定

translation.en: But, ultimately, he wanted to go on big adventures,
translation.zh: 但最终 他想去他的大冒险

translation.en: and my adventures are reading books and being a mom.
translation.zh: 但最终 他想去他的大冒险 而我的冒险就是读书和当妈妈

translation.en: So, we realized he needed somebody who always wanted to be by his side
translation.zh: 我们意识到他需要一个 时刻都想陪在他身边的人

translation.en: and that just wasn't gonna be me.
translation.zh: 而那个人不是我

translation.en: And your love life now?
translation.zh: 那你现在的感情生活呢？

translation.en: Sort of like… wind on an open prairie, or…
translation.zh: 有点像辽阔草原上的清风

translation.en: footsteps in an empty attic,
translation.zh: 或者空楼阁里的脚步声

translation.en: or what are those…
translation.zh: 或者 那种叫什么…

translation.en: Tumbleweeds going through an old ghost town. Sort of like that.
translation.zh: 在老旧鬼城里的风滚草 大概是这种样子

translation.en: Okay, we need to get on that.
translation.zh: 好的 我们得解决一下这个问题

translation.en: Well, good luck. It's been a minute.
translation.zh: 那祝我们好运 已经过去一分钟了

translation.en: Oh, I know that guy. He's a professor at my school, the guy with the bow tie.
translation.zh: 我认识那个人 他是我们学校的教授 蝴蝶领结

translation.en: -Wow, the guy he is sitting with is… -[Debbie] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -和他坐在一起的那个人… -天呐

translation.en: I know. He is fuego.
translation.zh: 我知道 他很帅

translation.en: Oh, no, yes, that-- And that's, uh, Theo Martin.
translation.zh: 不 对 那人是西奥马丁

translation.en: He's the editor of Duncan Press.
translation.zh: 他是“邓肯出版社”的编辑

translation.en: They publish the best contemporary fiction on earth.
translation.zh: 他们出版的当代小说天下无出其右

translation.en: Mmm, yeah. I only listen to celebrity bios.
translation.zh: 是啊 我只听名人的简介

translation.en: The Rob Lowe one is my favorite. The first one, of course.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的是罗伯劳 第一名

translation.en: Theo Martin is so famous.
translation.zh: 西奥马丁超级有名

translation.en: Also, he's yummy, and he's sitting with someone you know.
translation.zh: 还很可口呢 而且他和你认识的人在坐在一起

translation.en: -He's very attractive, that's true. -So, come on.
translation.zh: -他是很可口 没错 -走吧

translation.en: Wait, where you going? Oh, oh… okay. Maybe I should bring my plant.
translation.zh: 你要去哪里？ 好吧 也许我该带上我的盆栽

translation.en: -It's true. You know, ambitious. -Hi! Sorry to barge over.
translation.zh: -对 野心勃勃 -嗨！抱歉唐突叨扰

translation.en: But we saw you from over there--
translation.zh: 我们在那边看到你…

translation.en: Hold on, you! You were in my class.
translation.zh: 等等 你在我的课上

translation.en: -You came over and I saw… Yeah, hi. -Yeah! That was me.
translation.zh: -你走过来 我说… -对！是我

translation.en: I never forget a denim skirt.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记牛仔裙的

translation.en: Cute! That's a really cool story! I'm Minka. This is Debbie. You are?
translation.zh: 可爱！真是个精彩的故事！ 我叫明卡 她是黛比 你们是？

translation.en: -Theo Martin from Duncan Press. -Yes.
translation.zh: -“邓肯出版社”的西奥马丁 -对

translation.en: I recognized you. I've read every Duncan Press book.
translation.zh: 我认得你 “邓肯出版社”的每本书我都看过

translation.en: Wow. Well, not every book. I mean, no way. [laughs] Yes, way!
translation.zh: -不是每一本书 我是说 不可能 -真的 可能！

translation.en: Okay, 870-page tome set on a pirate ship in the South Pacific?
translation.zh: 好吧 870页的巨著 故事发生在南太平洋一艘海盗船上？

translation.en: Hobart's Horizon. I read it in two days. Ahoy!
translation.zh: 《霍巴特的地平线》？ 我两天就看完了 啊嗬！

translation.en: All right, spy novel set in Crete.
translation.zh: 好吧 设定在克里特岛上的间谍小说

translation.en: Oh, Ocean of Lies! I mean, one of the best!
translation.zh: 《谎言海洋》最棒的一本之一！

translation.en: I kept saying for a week, "Eímai katáskopos!"
translation.zh: 我一整个星期都不停在说 “我是个间谍”

translation.en: -That's, um, Greek for "I am a spy." -"I am a spy."
translation.zh: -啥意思？ -是希腊语的“我是个间谍” -“我是个间谍” -没错

translation.en: -Sure. -All right, I got it, I got it.
translation.zh: -“我是个间谍” -没错 好吧 我知道了

translation.en: You did not read the Dust Bowl book, because no one read the Dust Bowl book.
translation.zh: 你肯定没看过《沙尘暴》 因为没有人看过

translation.en: Where The Rattlesnake Sings. I-- I bought it the day it came out.
translation.zh: 响尾蛇唱歌那本？ 它出版当天我就买了

translation.en: That was you? I'm pretty sure we only sold the one copy.
translation.zh: 那个人是你？ 我很确定我们就卖出去了一本

translation.en: That was me! I bought it!
translation.zh: 是我！我买了！

translation.en: -[Theo] Wow. -Anyway, yeah. [Theo] S-- So many vegetables.
translation.zh: -总之 没错 -好多蔬菜啊

translation.en: Oh, I know, isn't this crazy?
translation.zh: 我知道 很夸张有没有？

translation.en: I even said, "Oh, what? Should I get some dip with my crudité platter?"
translation.zh: 我甚至还说： “我要不要给我的剩菜丁弄个蘸酱？”

translation.en: -[Minka] It was so nice to meet you both! -[Theo] Yeah, you too.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识两位！ -嗯 我们也是

translation.en: Can I get your number, actually?
translation.zh: 我能问问你的电话号码吗？

translation.en: I occasionally have galleys to give away, signed ones even.
translation.zh: 我偶尔会有样书赠送 甚至是签名版的

translation.en: [gasps] I would love that!
translation.zh: 我偶尔会有样书赠送 甚至是签名版的 乐意之至！

translation.en: [Minka] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Here, put in your number.
translation.zh: 给 把你的号码存进去

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: -好了 -好嘞！再见 男士们！

translation.en: -Okay! Ciao, boys! -Ciao.
translation.zh: -好了 -好嘞！再见 男士们！ -好的 我们走这边 -再见

translation.en: -[professor] We're gonna go this way. -OMG, he is into you!
translation.zh: -好的 我们走这边 -再见 天呐 他喜欢你！

translation.en: -No, he's not. -Uh, okay.
translation.zh: -没有的事 -好吧

translation.en: -He's being nice. -No, he's not.
translation.zh: -他只是人好 -才不是呢

translation.en: That is what "into you" looks like.
translation.zh: 那是“喜欢你”的样子

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, please!
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: It's cute how you like the book people, and how you and Peter actually read books.
translation.zh: 你喜欢那些读书人 还有你和彼得 真的会拿起书来看 这还真挺可爱的

translation.en: -[sighs] -It's very cute.
translation.zh: 非常可爱

translation.en: [Debbie] Yeah, we always had that in common.
translation.zh: 是啊 这是我们一直以来的共同点

translation.en: We were just two old-fashioned book lovers.
translation.zh: 我们就是两个老派的书籍爱好者

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: And, well, there's the book he wrote.
translation.zh: 他写了本书

translation.en: -What book? -Novel, big thing, massive.
translation.zh: -什么书？ -小说 长篇 超长

translation.en: [chuckles] What? No.
translation.zh: 什么？不可能

translation.en: [mock chuckles] "What?" Yeah.
translation.zh: 什么？不可能 “什么？” 真的

translation.en: I don't believe you.
translation.zh: 我才不信呢

translation.en: I'm telling you, he wrote a whole big fat book.
translation.zh: 他写了一本超厚的书

translation.en: Keeps it in an envelope in his oven.
translation.zh: 放在烤箱里的一个信封里

translation.en: I found it once when I was trying to bake keto brownies, which, by the way, do not recommend.
translation.zh: 我准备烤生酮布朗尼的时候发现的 不推荐尝试

translation.en: Two out of ten. There's zucchini in the recipe.
translation.zh: 十分给两分吧 食谱里还有西葫芦

translation.en: Peter used to want to be a writer, but he quit when he moved here.
translation.zh: 十分给两分吧 食谱里还有西葫芦 彼得以前一直想当作家的 但他搬来这里后就放弃了

translation.en: He-- He doesn't write anymore. Uh-huh. Except for the part where…
translation.zh: -他已经不写作了 -除了…

translation.en: he does.
translation.zh: 他还在写

translation.en: Open it.
translation.zh: 打开看看

translation.en: The Boy by P. Coleman. Peter!
translation.zh: 《男孩》P科尔曼著 彼得！

translation.en: Wow. You're good at detective-y things.
translation.zh: 你很擅长推理

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Peter wrote a whole novel and never mentioned it to me?
translation.zh: 彼得写了一本小说 但从来没跟我提过？

translation.en: You should read it. I didn't read it because it's a book.
translation.zh: 你应该读读看 我没有读过 因为这是一本书

translation.en: Oh, no, I-- I can't read it.
translation.zh: 不行 我不能看

translation.en: If-- If he wanted me to read it, he would have told me, because we tell each other everything.
translation.zh: 如果他想让我看 他早就跟我说了 我们对彼此无话不说的

translation.en: I mean, obviously, you don't.
translation.zh: 我想说 很明显 你们不是

translation.en: But we do.
translation.zh: 但我们真的是

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: See, that's the thing. We tell each other… everything.
translation.zh: 事情就是这样的 我们什么事都会告诉对方

translation.en: "Everything."
translation.zh: “所有事”

translation.en: [Peter] All right, this is a minor setback, right?
translation.zh: 好吧 这是一个小小挫折 好吗？

translation.en: This happens all the time at the beginning of a project.
translation.zh: 在项目之初 这种情况非常常见

translation.en: What we need to do is pivot, okay? We're gonna stay with the same approach--
translation.zh: 我们需要做的就是转向 好吗？ -保持原方法不变… -我不想说话

translation.en: I don't want to talk.
translation.zh: -保持原方法不变… -我不想说话

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: That sucked.
translation.zh: 今天糟透了

translation.en: My problem-solving skills are…
translation.zh: 我解决问题的技巧…

translation.en: I guess, more pertain to the business world.
translation.zh: 我猜更适用于商场上吧

translation.en: Thanks for the tickets. I enjoyed watching the game.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的票 我比赛看得很开心

translation.en: Okay, you're being polite.
translation.zh: 你这是在客气

translation.en: This is bad.
translation.zh: 糟透了

translation.en: 'Night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [Peter] Hey, hi.
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: Hey! How are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿！你过得怎么样？

translation.en: -[Peter] I'm good. -Good, good.
translation.zh: 很好啊 -那就好 -等等 怎么了？

translation.en: Wait, what's wrong? It's-- You're-- It's late where you are.
translation.zh: -那就好 -等等 怎么了？ -现在很晚了 -没事

translation.en: Uh, no. You know what? It sounds echo-y there.
translation.zh: -现在很晚了 -没事 你那边听起来有回音 你是在浴缸里吗？

translation.en: -Are you in the bathtub? -No! I don't take baths.
translation.zh: 你那边听起来有回音 你是在浴缸里吗？ 不是 我不泡澡的

translation.en: I don't even get baths.
translation.zh: 我甚至都不洗澡的

translation.en: Right, right. You and I tell each other everything, right?
translation.zh: 是哈 我们俩 什么事都会告诉对方的 对吧？

translation.en: -No. -What?
translation.zh: -不对 -什么？

translation.en: I took Jack to the hockey game
translation.zh: 我没问你就带杰克去看冰球比赛了

translation.en: without asking you first, and he brought his friends Wade and Evan.
translation.zh: 我没问你就带杰克去看冰球比赛了 他还叫上了韦德和埃文

translation.en: You got Wade and Evan to hang out with Jack?
translation.zh: 你让韦德和埃文跟杰克一起玩了？

translation.en: Yes. I-- Yeah, yes. And-- And he ate pizza.
translation.zh: 是的 他还吃了披萨

translation.en: It was gluten-free pizza, but pizza all the same.
translation.zh: 是无麦麸披萨 但披萨都是一样的

translation.en: -Okay, Peter, I-- -I-- I'm not done.
translation.zh: -好吧 彼得 我… -我还没说完

translation.en: We're not gonna eat your casseroles, Debbie. Uh, ever. They're gross.
translation.zh: 我们是不会吃你的砂锅菜的 黛比 永远不会 太恶心了

translation.en: Okay, thank you. That's a refreshing amount of honesty.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你的诚实让人精神一振

translation.en: I got it all out. That's it.
translation.zh: 我全说出来了 就这些了

translation.en: Look, you don't have to report everything to me. I trust you.
translation.zh: 你不用什么事都跟我报告的 我信任你

translation.en: -You do? -Mostly.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -差不多吧

translation.en: -And you trust me, right? -[chuckles] Of course.
translation.zh: -你也信任我的 对吧？ -当然

translation.en: So, if you ever wanted to tell me about anything, you could, right?
translation.zh: 如果你想跟我说什么 你可以放心说的 对吧？

translation.en: Tell you? About what?
translation.zh: 告诉你什么？

translation.en: I mean, I don't know.
translation.zh: 那个 我不知道

translation.en: -Like, if you have a special project. -You want to hear about my projects?
translation.zh: -如果你有什么特别项目的话 -你想听我的那些项目？

translation.en: My point is, you can tell me anything. Which is what I do, like, always.
translation.zh: -我的重点是 你什么都能跟我说 -我也正是这么做的啊

translation.en: Same. I mean, total honesty.
translation.zh: 一样 绝对诚实

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 永远都是

translation.en: Always.
translation.zh: 永远都是

translation.en: [professor] There are six critical elements that we have to consider
translation.zh: 在决定使用哪一种风险模型时

translation.en: when deciding which risk model to use.
translation.zh: 我们要考虑六个关键要素…

translation.en: Now, are you sure Peter would want you to do this?
translation.zh: 你确定彼得会希望你这么做吗？

translation.en: I'm doing this for Peter!
translation.zh: 我这么做是为了彼得！

translation.en: -Mmm. -Oh, here he comes. Here he comes.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: [Minka] Oh, God, he is so happy to see you. It's so cute, it's gross!
translation.zh: 天啊 他很高兴能来见你 真可爱 让人起鸡皮疙瘩！

translation.en: -Hi, Minka. -Hi! Hey.
translation.zh: -嗨！ -嗨 明卡

translation.en: Thank you so much for coming.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你能来

translation.en: Sure, don't worry about it. I was-- It was on my way, so…
translation.zh: 小事 不用在意 我顺路的

translation.en: Oh, okay. Well, I wanted to give you this manuscript.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想把这份手稿给你

translation.en: -Ah. -And I wanted to get it to you ASAP.
translation.zh: 我想尽快拿给你 因为我很快就要离开这里了

translation.en: -Because I'm leaving town soon. -Wait, is this your book?
translation.zh: 我想尽快拿给你 因为我很快就要离开这里了 -这是你的书吗？你写的？ -不是 不是我写的

translation.en: -Did you write this? -Oh, no, no. I didn't-- I didn't write it.

translation.en: But it's magical and, uh… But…

translation.en: …amazing, you know?

translation.en: I mean, we've been friends for a long time.

translation.en: Right. Look.

translation.en: You and Debbie, you have your thing, which is different from our thing.

translation.en: -Your thing. Yeah. -Right! Like, you're her friend.

translation.en: I'm her neighbor and, like, part-time lover, you know?

translation.en: -What was that? -Oh, you know what?

translation.en: You probably haven't noticed this because you guys are just friends, but…

translation.en: brodiddly, she is pretty hot.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I mean, I know, I know, she's out of my league. I got it. But I have a plan.

translation.en: Okay? My thing is…
translation.zh: 好吗？我的计划是…

translation.en: I just keep showing up in her life, you know?

translation.en: And then maybe, maybe, she'll change her mind about me.
translation.zh: 这样 她也许就会对我改变心意

translation.en: You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: In the meantime, I'll take friends with benefits.

translation.en: I really love how the book starts.

translation.en: -Oh, isn't it amazing? -[sighs happily]

translation.en: It reminded me of As I Lay Dying.

translation.en: -Faulkner? Really? -Mmm.

translation.en: Yeah, I was thinking more Franzen.

translation.en: Oh, I see that. The-- The family dynamics?

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -我能理解 家庭关系？ -对 对 你确实发现了宝藏

translation.en: I mean, you really-- You really found a gem.
translation.zh: 对 你确实发现了宝藏

translation.en: I think I did.

translation.en: The book that I have read the most is House of Mirth.

translation.en: Oh, Edith Wharton. Very underrated social critic, I must say.

translation.en: -Scathing. -Do you like her work? Of course!
translation.zh: -你喜欢她的作品吗？ -当然！

translation.en: Look, anybody who doesn't love Edie Dubs just hasn't really read Edie Dubs.
translation.zh: 不喜欢伊迪丝华顿的 都是没有真正读过伊迪丝华顿的人

translation.en: [laughs] And I cry my eyes out every time Lily Bart dies.
translation.zh: 不喜欢伊迪丝华顿的 都是没有真正读过伊迪丝华顿的人 莉莉巴特死的那段 我每次都会哭到眼瞎

translation.en: Oh, I know! And then poor Lawrence shows up the next morning to propose. Like, buddy, come on!

translation.en: It's just a little bit late.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry, but I have perished, mon ami.

translation.en: [sighs] But looked gorgeous doing it.

translation.en: Do you know what Walt Whitman said about the Brooklyn Bridge?

translation.en: No, tell me.

translation.en: He said, "It was the best and most effective medicine
translation.zh: 他说： “这是我的灵魂迄今为止 服用过的最好 最有效的药物”

translation.en: my soul has yet partaken."
translation.zh: “这是我的灵魂迄今为止 服用过的最好 最有效的药物”

translation.en: That's a really great quote.

translation.en: Sadly, that's the Manhattan Bridge.

translation.en: Good quote, though.

translation.en: -Oh, okay! -[both laugh]

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: Uh… Uh, yeah.

translation.en: Yes!

translation.en: Oh, come on, who-- who sorts books by color?

translation.en: -Honestly? -That is what I said!
translation.zh: -谁会按颜色给书分类啊？真的吗？ -我也是这么说的！
