translation.en: And as a wise person said once, too much of anything is bad,

translation.en: but too much Champagne is just right.

translation.en: Oh. Hi.

translation.en: Vanessa Morton.

translation.en: Peter Coleman. I couldn't believe it when my phone rang.

translation.en: I-- Who would've thunk you'd have the same number?

translation.en: -I didn't change it for this exact reason. -[laughs] Oh, really?

translation.en: How long has it been?

translation.en: And yet I'm 30. Weird.

translation.en: Amazing.

translation.en: I am here watching her kid for a while.

translation.en: Wow! You? The rolling stone?

translation.en: -[Peter] So… -[Vanessa] Mm?

translation.en: -[Peter] Do you have kids? -Nope.

translation.en: -No? -No kids or husband.

translation.en: It's actually really quiet.

translation.en: I was just thinking… You know, if you want, I live right near here.

translation.en: [sighs] I mean, I-- I wanted to.

translation.en: I-- I had a moment with a woman.

translation.en: But that guy is…

translation.en: I-- I don't know, but he smells terrific.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: -Immediately. Please. -Okay.

translation.en: after, I told her to stay away from me, because…

translation.en: I-- It's-- And-- And-- And then I just--

translation.en: I found myself thinking about her. A lot.

translation.en: So I was gonna call her and see if she…

translation.en: I saw Hunt for Red October there like eight times.

translation.en: Yeah, anyway, the-- So, when I saw them,

translation.en: it-- I-- I could tell.

translation.en: You-- So I just-- I let it go.

translation.en: And I'd done, like, uh, therapy in there, right?

translation.en: And so when she comes to get me, I'm on this truth kick,

translation.en: and I'm gonna tell her how I feel about her.

translation.en: So-- But she was still married. And-- But they didn't have a kid yet.

translation.en: And he was away a lot. He was doing his climbing thing.

translation.en: -What was that? -It was cl-- climbing.

translation.en: Like, his-- Look, he would climb the mountains.

translation.en: Okay, well, it looks like fishing.

translation.en: Anyway, so I get in the car… and…

translation.en: she tells me she's pregnant.

translation.en: No! No, it was the quakes.

translation.en: Oh, right, the "scary quakes."

translation.en: Dude, remember, I was at the first poker game.
translation.zh: -你记得我参加了第一场牌局 -对

translation.en: -Yeah. -You played like shit.
translation.zh: -你记得我参加了第一场牌局 -对 你打得烂透了 但你敢于冒险 当时的那个家伙是怎么了？？

translation.en: That guy is…

translation.en: Drank too much, and he quit writing,

translation.en: and he's got a friend, and she lives across the country,

translation.en: and, most importantly, he's dated like a million women,

translation.en: and it never lasts more than six months.

translation.en: Why? Because he is an unknowable piece of shit.

translation.en: No, no, it's because he has been with the wrong people.

translation.en: -Stop telling yourself that story. -Mmm.

translation.en: Peter! Your whole life has been leading up to this point.

translation.en: Don't waste a second. Oh, my God.

translation.en: -I… -But what are you gonna do?

translation.en: ♪ I work here all day ♪ ♪ Making this hay ♪

translation.en: ♪ I sit here and stew ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just sipping a brew ♪

translation.en: ♪ The only thing missing is you ♪
translation.zh: 唯一缺少的就是你

translation.en: [gasps] Shit! What time is it?
translation.zh: 该死！几点了？

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm late for my final. Your what now?
translation.zh: -天啊 我期终考要迟到了 -你的什么？

translation.en: Um, the, uh, final draft of a book that I'm editing.
translation.zh: 我正在编辑的一本书的最终校稿

translation.en: You can show yourself out, right? Great!
translation.zh: 你自己会出去的 对吧？太好了！

translation.en: [Peter] Breakfast.
translation.zh: 早餐

translation.en: Raisins!
translation.zh: 葡萄干！

translation.en: Ooh! Terrible.
translation.zh: 真难吃

translation.en: Not bad.
translation.zh: 还不错

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Um, sorry we didn't get to talk yesterday, but…
translation.zh: 抱歉我们昨天没能说上话 不过…

translation.en: Look, I just…
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: I just wanted to say thank you again.
translation.zh: 我只是想再跟你说声谢谢

translation.en: I-- I know-- I know you don't like gratitude, and "thank you's" bother you and all that, but I just…
translation.zh: 我知道你不喜欢被感激之情 以及“谢谢”打扰 但我只是…

translation.en: Thanks to you, I got to have this amazing week.
translation.zh: 多亏了你 我度过了美好的一周

translation.en: And I… I don't even know how I would ever repay you.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道该怎么报答你

translation.en: I'm gonna try until my dying breath. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我会坚持努力到咽气

translation.en: But, um, anyway, I'll-- Just call me anytime or I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: 不过 随时打电话给我 或者我很快就能见到你了

translation.en: Oh, my God. I'll see you soon. Okay.
translation.zh: 天啊 我很快就能见到你了 好吧

translation.en: [sniffs] No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: Uh, okay. How much for three?
translation.zh: 好了 三盆多少钱？

translation.en: ♪ Oh ♪
translation.zh: （在这里放一张可爱的照片）

translation.en: Oh, hey. Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -[Theo] Hey, I got you! -Yeah, you got me.
translation.zh: -嘿 我抓到你了！ -对 你抓到我了

translation.en: Well, listen, I know it's your last night, I don't want to monopolize you
translation.zh: 我知道今天是你最后一晚 我不想在你回家前独占你的时间

translation.en: before you go home,
translation.zh: 我不想在你回家前独占你的时间

translation.en: but I've got something important I'd like to talk to you about.
translation.zh: 但我有重要的事情想跟你谈谈

translation.en: A proposal, kind of.
translation.zh: 算是提案吧

translation.en: -Uh, if you are free for a drink? -Oh, um, yeah, sure.
translation.zh: -如果你有空喝一杯的话？ -行 没问题

translation.en: Brownstone Club?
translation.zh: 布朗石俱乐部？

translation.en: Great!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: [Minka] "Proposal"? Wow.
translation.zh: 提案？

translation.en: Yeah. Well…
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: What is it? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 什么？怎么了？

translation.en: Nothing, it's just… [sighs] I haven't heard from Peter.
translation.zh: 没什么 只是…我一直没有彼得的消息

translation.en: Jack and I texted, but I haven't heard from Peter.
translation.zh: 杰克和我发过短信了 但我没有彼得的消息

translation.en: Okay, I can't with this mood. Look at what you've done.
translation.zh: 好吧 我受不了这种情绪 看看你做了些什么

translation.en: In a measly few days, you got a boring as hell but useful, I guess, degree,
translation.zh: 才几天 你就拿到了一个无聊透顶 但我猜非常有用的学位、

translation.en: got Peter's book published, and befriended an adorable millennial, me.
translation.zh: 让彼得的书得以出版、还和一个 可爱的千禧一代 我本人 成了朋友

translation.en: And then Theo, the sexy cherry on top! I mean--
translation.zh: 还有西奥 性感的锦上添花之笔！

translation.en: No, no, you're right. You're right. It's just-- It's just a little bit weird when I don't hear from him.
translation.zh: 不 你说得对 只是没有他的消息 感觉有点怪怪的

translation.en: Forget Peter!
translation.zh: 忘掉彼得！

translation.en: Theo, Theo, Theo! That's who you're seeing right now.
translation.zh: 西奥！这位才是你现在要去见的人

translation.en: Guess we don't have time to buy you a new dress.
translation.zh: 我猜我们不够时间给你买条裙子了

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm just gonna go as Debbie tonight. Just regular Debbie.
translation.zh: 不用 我今晚 就穿黛比风就好 日常的黛比

translation.en: Speaking of which, I've been looking for my jean jacket.
translation.zh: 我一直在找我的牛仔夹克

translation.en: -Have you seen it? -I mean, hard to say.
translation.zh: -你见过它吗？ -很难说

translation.en: Can't really pick it out from all the other mass-market denim
translation.zh: 无法从其他散落的大众牛仔裤

translation.en: and chambray items strewn about.
translation.zh: 和条纹商品中认出它来

translation.en: Also, you do know they make these things called spinners now?
translation.zh: 另外 你知道 现在有万向轮这种东西吧？

translation.en: -There's something under here. -What is it?
translation.zh: -这下面有东西 -什么东西？

translation.en: Drugs? Porn? What?
translation.zh: 毒品？黄片？什么？

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天呐

translation.en: He wrote another book?
translation.zh: 他还写了另一本书？

translation.en: Real scribbler, this guy.
translation.zh: 这家伙可真是个写手

translation.en: It's not a book.
translation.zh: 这不是书

translation.en: We should definitely not open that.
translation.zh: 我们绝对不应该把它打开

translation.en: No, yeah, here's the thing about me. I respect people's privacy.
translation.zh: 不 对 我很尊重个人隐私

translation.en: Same. As my drunk mother used to always say, "Mind your own business."
translation.zh: 一样 就像我的酒鬼老妈 以前常说的：“别多管闲事”

translation.en: -Five-star parking. All right. -[chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 五星级车位 好了

translation.en: Don't you want to…
translation.zh: 你不想…

translation.en: I mean, tryouts start in 15 minutes, so…
translation.zh: 选拔赛15分钟后就要开始了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: So, what happens next?
translation.zh: 那接下来会怎么样？

translation.en: Mm, like after practice? I don't know. We can get a slushie. I enjoy their slushies.
translation.zh: 训练结束后？我们可以去 喝杯冰沙 我很喜欢他们的冰沙

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: 嗯 我也是

translation.en: Um, no, I mean, like, with you, and me, and Mom.
translation.zh: 不 我是说你、我、还有妈妈

translation.en: Well, I go back to New York, and--
translation.zh: 我会回纽约 而…

translation.en: Yeah. Uh, yeah, let-- Let's say that didn't happen.
translation.zh: 好吧 假设你没回去吧

translation.en: I mean like, it just seems that we make a good team, the three of us.
translation.zh: 我们似乎很合拍 我们三个

translation.en: -Wow, yeah. -Here, in LA, in our house.
translation.zh: -是啊 -在这里 在洛杉矶 在我们的家里

translation.en: I don't know how you guys decide this kind of stuff, but that was just a thought I had.
translation.zh: 我不知道你们是怎么决定这些事的 但这只是我个人的想法

translation.en: I don't know how we decide this stuff either. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我也不知道我们是怎么决定这些事的

translation.en: What's that look for?
translation.zh: 那是什么表情？

translation.en: You look like you just felt an earthquake or something.
translation.zh: 你看起来好像经历了地震似的

translation.en: Well, I better get in there. Hockey tryouts.
translation.zh: 我该进去了 冰球选拔赛

translation.en: -See you in there. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -里面见 -行

translation.en: Peter hates mementos.
translation.zh: 彼得最讨厌纪念品了

translation.en: So many pictures of… you.
translation.zh: 好多你的照片

translation.en: And postcards I sent him?
translation.zh: 我寄给他的明信片？

translation.en: Oh, the Dodger game!
translation.zh: 道奇队的比赛！

translation.en: Oh, I-- I found that in Texas.
translation.zh: 这是我在德州找到的

translation.en: [Minka] Yeah.
translation.zh: 真可爱

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: Oh, my God. He saved it too?
translation.zh: 天啊 这个他也还留着？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: This makes so much sense. Why he couldn't fall in love with me.
translation.zh: 这就能解释为什么他无法爱上我了

translation.en: There had to be a reason. It couldn't be because of me.
translation.zh: 一定是有原因的 但不可能是因为我

translation.en: I'm the best.
translation.zh: 我是最棒的

translation.en: Do you love him too?
translation.zh: 你也爱他吗？

translation.en: I'm…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I think I… [sighs] I feel like…
translation.zh: 我想我觉得…

translation.en: -Okay. [clears throat] -[groans woozily]
translation.zh: 好吧 我跟你说说我怎么想的

translation.en: -I'll tell you what I think. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧 我跟你说说我怎么想的 好啊

translation.en: I think you fell in love with Peter that first night you hooked up.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们上床的那晚 你就爱上了彼得

translation.en: What? No. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 什么？没有

translation.en: That would be reckless and impractical, and I am not--
translation.zh: 那太鲁莽和不切实际了 我不是…

translation.en: Human? We know. That's why you freaked out about his book
translation.zh: 人类？我们都知道 所以你才会被他的书吓坏了 像个疯子一样跑来跑去

translation.en: and ran around like a little lunatic with it?
translation.zh: 所以你才会被他的书吓坏了 像个疯子一样跑来跑去

translation.en: No, I didn't!
translation.zh: 我才没有呢！

translation.en: Oh, my God, I did. [gasps] Oh, my God. Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 天啊 我有 天啊 我有

translation.en: Because you're in love. You are.
translation.zh: 因为你爱他

translation.en: Don't make me sing "I Am A Woman In Love" by Barbra Streisand, 'cause I will.
translation.zh: 别逼我唱芭芭拉史翠珊的《我是个 恋爱中的女人》 因为我真的会唱

translation.en: -I sang it at my nana's retirement home. -No, no, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -我在我奶奶的养老院唱过 -不

translation.en: Even if I felt like Peter and I were…
translation.zh: 就算我觉得彼得和我是…

translation.en: No, no, no. He-- Peter's not interested in me like that.
translation.zh: 不 彼得对我没有那种感觉

translation.en: -Um-- -He let me know that night.
translation.zh: 这么多年 他通过和各种 跟我毫无相似之处的女人交往

translation.en: And-- And over the years, just by dating women
translation.zh: 这么多年 他通过和各种 跟我毫无相似之处的女人交往 让我明白了那晚是什么情况

translation.en: who are utterly nothing like me.
translation.zh: 让我明白了那晚是什么情况

translation.en: I would just…
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: No. And I would never risk my friendship with him on the off-chance--
translation.zh: 不 我绝对不会拿我的友谊去碰运气…

translation.en: Don't you get it? All you have to do is take a chance.
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？你要做的就是冒一次险

translation.en: No, see, that's what you don't get about me, is I don't take chances.
translation.zh: 不 这是你不了解我的地方 我是不会去冒险的

translation.en: What I have is great, and-- and-- and I appreciate it, you know?

translation.en: You get what you get, and you don't get upset.
translation.zh: 乐天知命 安然若素

translation.en: And-- And… that's how I live my life.
translation.zh: 我就是这样生活的

translation.en: And-- And that is how I play poker. I never draw into a straight.
translation.zh: 这也是我打牌的方法 我从来不会冒进

translation.en: You know what I mean? You don't, 'cause you don't play poker,
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思吗？ 你不明白 因为你不打牌 但我之后会解释的 下次

translation.en: but I'll explain it later, at a different time.
translation.zh: 你不明白 因为你不打牌 但我之后会解释的 下次

translation.en: But this is just… [sighs] This is who I am.
translation.zh: 但这就是…我就是这样的人

translation.en: And-- And-- And I evaluate odds and it has kept me safe,
translation.zh: 我会评估概率 这样能保证我安全

translation.en: and it has kept my kid safe, and I just-- I just need to be safe.
translation.zh: 也让我的孩子很安全 我只需要能安全

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: No, no! No. No! No.
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: No. Okay, I just don't understand
translation.zh: 不！ 我不明白你为什么 不考虑一下我对这件事的看法

translation.en: why you're not taking into consideration how I feel about this.
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么 不考虑一下我对这件事的看法

translation.en: I have to-- I have to go! I don't want to talk about this anymore. I have to take a shower, I'm gonna go see Theo.

translation.en: -And Peter? -Just forget about it. I don't want to roll the dice.
translation.zh: -那彼得呢？ -忘了这事吧 我不想冒险

translation.en: If you start with another poker analogy, I will perish.
translation.zh: 如果你又要用扑克牌来类比 我会崩溃的

translation.en: You do take chances, by the way. I've seen it.
translation.zh: 你是会冒险的 顺便说一句 我见识过

translation.en: You can do this.
translation.zh: 你能做得到的

translation.en: You can tell Peter how you feel. You can.
translation.zh: 你可以告诉彼得你的感觉 你可以的

translation.en: [man] Let's go, guys! Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧 各位！加油！

translation.en: Come on, kid.
translation.zh: 加油 小子

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, gosh, okay!
translation.zh: 天啊 好了！

translation.en: Hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: [Theo] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: I'm so sorry I'm late.
translation.zh: 抱歉我迟到了

translation.en: -Did you run here? -No, I'm just…
translation.zh: -你是跑来的吗？ -没有 我只是…

translation.en: I'm just a little bit breathless.
translation.zh: 我只是有点喘不上气来

translation.en: -Well, me too. -Okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我也是 好吧！

translation.en: -Hi. -God, I--
translation.zh: -嗨 -天呐

translation.en: I wanted to wait till appetizers, but do you mind if I just start?
translation.zh: 我本来想等到开胃菜上来的 但你介意我现在开始吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: Get in there, get in there!
translation.zh: 冲进去！

translation.en: [Peter yells] Go, Jack!
translation.zh: 加油 杰克！

translation.en: My proposal for you is that I got you an interview at Macmillan.
translation.zh: 我给你的提案是 我帮你争取到了 一个去“麦克米伦出版”的面试机会

translation.en: Full-time editor position.
translation.zh: 全职编辑职位

translation.en: They need one, you're amazing, and they would be really lucky to have you.
translation.zh: 他们需要人手 你非常优秀 如果你能去 那是他们的福气

translation.en: And the second part is-- is that I didn't get you an interview at-- at Duncan Press.
translation.zh: 第二部分是 我没能让你到 “邓肯出版社”来面试

translation.en: And that is because I feel like we should see what you and I have…
translation.zh: 因为我觉得 我们应该看看你跟我之间的感觉…

translation.en: are… uh, could be.
translation.zh: 是… 有可能的

translation.en: It's early, of course, just you shouldn't work with me
translation.zh: 当然 现在还太早 但你不应该和我一起共事如果我们…

translation.en: if we're even considering exploring that, you know?
translation.zh: 当然 现在还太早 但你不应该和我一起共事如果我们… 哪怕只是考虑去探索一下 你懂吗？

translation.en: And I know you had a whole life in LA. You know, I don't want to get ahead of myself.
translation.zh: 我知道你在洛杉矶有你的生活 我不想操之过急

translation.en: He says, terribly ahead of himself.
translation.zh: 他说 操之过急

translation.en: I… Wow.
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I-- I-- I don't know what to say.
translation.zh: 我不知道该说些什么

translation.en: Yeah, it's-- it's not a little bit, it's a lot.
translation.zh: 对 这不是一点点 是很多

translation.en: It's a lot.
translation.zh: 是挺多的

translation.en: There we go, there we go.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [coach] Let's go, guys! Keep at it! Let's go! Let's go.
translation.zh: 加油 各位！继续！加油！

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: -Go! Go! -[coach] Let's get it!
translation.zh: -上！ -拿下它！

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 上！

translation.en: Theo, you are wonderful.
translation.zh: 西奥 你是个好人

translation.en: Um, just this past week has been… unreal.
translation.zh: 只是过去这个星期感觉好不真实

translation.en: Uh, I really…
translation.zh: 我真的…

translation.en: The fact that you believe in me means the world to me.
translation.zh: 你对我的信任意味着一切

translation.en: Um, but earlier today, I…
translation.zh: 但今天早些时候 我…

translation.en: I was looking for my jean jacket, and-- and I was digging around,
translation.zh: 我正在找我的牛仔夹克 到处翻找

translation.en: and then I found this envelope, and, you know…
translation.zh: 然后我找到一个信封 然后…

translation.en: Oh, my God. This is the weirdest thing I've ever said. [inhales]
translation.zh: 这是我说过的最奇怪的话了

translation.en: I… I think I might be in love with somebody else.
translation.zh: 我想我可能爱着另一个人

translation.en: I know that's a crazy, crazy thing to say.
translation.zh: -是哦 -我知道这么说很疯狂

translation.en: I mean, love's crazy. Love's the worst.
translation.zh: 爱情就是很疯狂 爱情是最糟糕的事

translation.en: -It's a nightmare. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 简直是噩梦

translation.en: Especially when it hits you, whoosh, just out of nowhere.
translation.zh: 尤其是当它…突如其来击中你时

translation.en: [coach] Back up, back up, back up. Are you all right?
translation.zh: 退后 你没事吧？

translation.en: -You need to get that? -Uh… I-- I do.
translation.zh: -你需要接吗？ -需要

translation.en: -Don't worry about it. -I'm, uh-- I'll be right back.
translation.zh: -不用担心 -我马上回来

translation.en: [Debbie] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: I know that, um, we're gonna see each other tomorrow, but I wanted to--
translation.zh: 我知道我们明天就能见面了 但我想…

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？

translation.en: Oh, my God. What do you-- What do you mean, "hockey tryouts"?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 你说“冰球选拔赛”是什么意思？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的天呐！

translation.en: Ambulance got there so quick and he's with the doctor now, so…
translation.zh: 救护车很快就赶到了 他现在跟医生在一起 所以…

translation.en: Oh, here comes the doctor. I'm gonna put you on speaker.
translation.zh: 医生来了 我帮你开免提

translation.en: [Debbie] Oh, my God, is he okay?
translation.zh: 天啊 他还好吗？

translation.en: Uh, well, good news, he's doing great.
translation.zh: 好消息是 他情况很好

translation.en: -There-- There we go. -Ah!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: He does have a touch of a headache and some nausea.
translation.zh: 他确实有些头痛和恶心

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -So we're keeping him here overnight. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -我们会让他留院观察… -天啊

translation.en: Just to make sure he didn't sustain a concussion, improbably,
translation.zh: …确保他没有脑震荡 或者 这种情况不太可能 其他类型的血肿

translation.en: or another kind of hematoma.
translation.zh: 或者 这种情况不太可能 其他类型的血肿

translation.en: -[Debbie] Oh, my God! -[wincing]
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: [whimpers] I want to talk to him. Uh, he's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: -我想跟他说说话 -他不会有事的

translation.en: I don't want to talk to you, Peter! I want to talk to Jack!
translation.zh: 我不想跟你说话 彼得！ 我想跟杰克说话！

translation.en: Well, he's in his room.
translation.zh: 他在病房里

translation.en: Put Jack on the phone, Peter,
translation.zh: 让杰克接电话 彼得

translation.en: before the serious brain injury sets in and he doesn't remember who his mother is!
translation.zh: 在发生严重的脑损伤 他忘掉自己妈妈是谁之前！

translation.en: -I'm gonna-- I'm gonna go. -Yeah, you should, probably.
translation.zh: -我去一下 -对 你大概很应该

translation.en: Hematoma, that's, uh… That's what you want, right?
translation.zh: 血肿 那就是你想要的 对吧？

translation.en: -No, no, no. You don't want that. -Yeah, you don't? -That's-- That's a bad thing. -You don't.
translation.zh: -不 你不会想那样的 那很糟糕 -是哦 你不想要？你不想要

translation.en: [Peter] Yeah, I got-- He-- Yeah, he's right here. It's your mom.
translation.zh: 对 他就在旁边 是你妈妈

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, honey, are you okay?
translation.zh: -嘿 -亲爱的 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm fantastic!
translation.zh: 我好极了！

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm so sorry I'm not there.
translation.zh: 真对不起 我不在你身边

translation.en: I-- I-- I'm coming home right now. I--
translation.zh: 我现在就回家

translation.en: Mom, stop!
translation.zh: 妈妈 别说话！

translation.en: What? You're hurt, honey. This was the best week of my life.
translation.zh: -你受伤了 宝贝 -这是我人生中最棒的一个星期

translation.en: Me and Peter, like, we watched Alien, and drove in a convertible,
translation.zh: 我和彼得 我们看了《异形》 一起开敞篷车

translation.en: and I almost drank coffee.
translation.zh: 我还差点喝了咖啡

translation.en: W-- Wait, just slow down. Ba-- Back up, what? What?
translation.zh: 等等 说慢点 倒回去 什么？

translation.en: This week I got to be a different kind of me. It was kinda great.
translation.zh: 这个星期 我做了一回 不一样的我 感觉棒极了

translation.en: Don't be mad at Peter, okay?
translation.zh: 不要生彼得的气 好吗？

translation.en: I-- I-- Jack, I will deal with Peter separately.
translation.zh: 杰克 我会单独处理跟彼得的事

translation.en: And guess what? I made the hockey team!
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？我考进冰球队了！

translation.en: Okay, well, we're gonna have to discuss that when I get home.
translation.zh: 等我回家后 我们得讨论一下这件事

translation.en: No! I want to talk about it now.
translation.zh: 不 我现在就想谈

translation.en: I want to do it. I want you to let me.
translation.zh: 我想打冰球 我希望你能同意

translation.en: Look, I know you're afraid of stuff.
translation.zh: 我知道你会怕这怕那

translation.en: Sometimes, I am too, but I don't want that for us anymore.
translation.zh: 我也是 但我不希望我们继续这样了

translation.en: -Oh, okay. Um-- -Anyway, love you, Mom.
translation.zh: -好的… -总之 爱你 妈妈

translation.en: -I gotta go, my friends are here. -[Wade] Dude, you wiped out!
translation.zh: -我得挂了 我的朋友们在这儿 -兄弟 你简直横扫千军！

translation.en: -We were there! -It was epic!
translation.zh: -我们都看到了！ -载入史册！

translation.en: [Jack] It was super sick. Like, I remember getting tied up and, like, hooked.
translation.zh: 太精彩了 我还记得被人缠住然后箍住

translation.en: -Like, this guy crashed into me and then… -See? That's-- He's fine.
translation.zh: -那家伙撞到我身上然后… -看吧？他没事

translation.en: Well, and the-- And, look, I'm genuinely sorry that I didn't-- [Debbie] Is Alicia there?
translation.zh: -我真的很抱歉我没有… -艾丽西娅在吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. She's right here, and-- and I'm gonna be here when you get back.
translation.zh: 在 她就在旁边 你回来的时候我也会在这儿

translation.en: Please don't be. I'm coming home right now. Please just go.
translation.zh: 拜托别了 我现在就回家 拜托你走吧

translation.en: -But-- -Peter, just go!
translation.zh: -可是… -彼得 你快走！

translation.en: -Jack's had an emergency. He's hurt. -Is he okay?
translation.zh: -杰克出了意外 他受伤了 -他还好吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I have to go.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我得走了

translation.en: Theo, you're…
translation.zh: 西奥 你是…

translation.en: You know what you are.
translation.zh: 你知道你是什么样的人

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: [man] Oh! Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: [Debbie] I just landed in LA and I'm going straight to the hospital.
translation.zh: 我刚在洛杉矶降落 我会直接去医院

translation.en: -[Peter] He's not there. -What?
translation.zh: -他不在那里 -什么？

translation.en: [Peter] He's at home with Alicia and he's fine.
translation.zh: 他和艾丽西娅在家 而且他很好

translation.en: But I tried to call you a million times. I'm sorry, okay? I screwed up.
translation.zh: 我给你打了无数个电话 对不起 好吗？ 是我搞砸了 我应该在他去选拔前就告诉你的

translation.en: I should have told you before he tried out.
translation.zh: 是我搞砸了 我应该在他去选拔前就告诉你的

translation.en: You think?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Look, I thought I was giving him what he needed!
translation.zh: 我以为我给了他他需要的东西！

translation.en: -What? A hematoma? -Hi, by the way.
translation.zh: -什么？血肿吗？ -嗨 顺便一提

translation.en: -What? -I'm over here.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我在这边

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I'm going. You told me to go.
translation.zh: -你在这里做什么？ -我要走了 你让我走的

translation.en: Well, good. I should have told you,
translation.zh: -很好 -我应该告诉你的

translation.en: but there's some shit that you should have told me too.
translation.zh: 但有些事情你也应该先告诉我

translation.en: Oh, no, no, you don't get to turn this around.
translation.zh: 不 你可不能反过来说我

translation.en: -I talked to Minka. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我跟明卡聊过了 -是吗？

translation.en: She told me about the book. What you did is insane!
translation.zh: 她跟我说了那本书的事 你的所作所为太离谱了！

translation.en: -Look, I was gonna tell you about the-- -Oh, there's other stuff too.
translation.zh: -我本来打算跟你说那本书的事的 -还有别的事

translation.en: How about Zen? And what about Theo? As in, "Oh, Theo!"
translation.zh: 泽恩呢？西奥呢？ 就是“哦 西奥！”的那个

translation.en: -Hold on. How do you know about that? -There's a camera in my apartment.
translation.zh: -等等 你是怎么知道这件事的？ -我家有个摄像头

translation.en: You watched me and Theo?
translation.zh: 你看了我和西奥？

translation.en: Only long enough to want to poke my eyes out!
translation.zh: 看了一点 我就想戳瞎自己的眼睛！

translation.en: What happened to, "I'm done with all of that?" Well, I'm a person, Peter, I'm not a rock.
translation.zh: -“我已经受够那些了”是什么情况？ -我是个人 不是石头

translation.en: That's literally what you said! "My heart is a cold, hard stone."
translation.zh: 那就是你的原话！ “我的心已经冷若磐石了”

translation.en: Okay, okay, well-- And you talking about somebody's personal life?
translation.zh: 你对别人的私生活指指点点？

translation.en: Oh, okay. Here we go.
translation.zh: 好吧 来了

translation.en: I gave you my kid.
translation.zh: 我把我的孩子交给了你

translation.en: He is my whole life!
translation.zh: 他是我的命根子

translation.en: Which is maybe a problem.
translation.zh: 这也许就是问题所在

translation.en: I cannot believe you.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: You always said you were a piece of shit. Well, maybe you were right!
translation.zh: 你总是说自己是个混蛋 也许你说得对

translation.en: -That was really fucking mean. -Okay, well, you--
translation.zh: -这他妈真的太过分了 -好吧 你…

translation.en: What? I dropped my life to come help you? Is that what I did wrong?
translation.zh: 我放下了我的生活过来帮你？ 这就是我做错的事吗？

translation.en: You're unbelievable! Unbelievable!
translation.zh: 你不可理喻！不可理喻！

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Wait! Wait, don't… Hold on a second.
translation.zh: 等等 别…等一下

translation.en: -I'm so mad at-- -What the hell is wrong with you?
translation.zh: -我非常生气… -你到底怎么回事？

translation.en: -You went through my things? -Why didn't you tell me?
translation.zh: -你翻了我的东西？ -你为什么不告诉我？

translation.en: [voice breaks] Why didn't you say anything? Why did you let so much time go by?
translation.zh: 你为什么什么都不说？ 你为什么要浪费这么多的光阴？

translation.en: -Be-- Because I was scared! -Scared of what?
translation.zh: -因为我很害怕！ -怕什么？

translation.en: -Scared that I'm not good enough for you! -Oh!
translation.zh: 我怕自己配不上你！

translation.en: Scared that you're gonna reject me if I tell you how I feel.
translation.zh: 我怕如果我告诉你我的感觉 你会拒绝我

translation.en: Well, just tell me how you feel!
translation.zh: 告诉我你的感觉！

translation.en: You know how I feel!
translation.zh: 你知道我什么感觉！

translation.en: Wait, what? That, what, you're in love with me or something? No!
translation.zh: -是什么？你喜欢我？ -不是！

translation.en: Debbie, I am madly, deeply, overwhelmingly in love with you.
translation.zh: 黛比 我疯狂地、深深地、 不可自拔地爱着你

translation.en: And I have been since the moment I met you.
translation.zh: 我从认识你的那一刻起就这样了

translation.en: Well, you could have said something. We talk every day.
translation.zh: 你早该说出来的 我们每天都会聊天

translation.en: Well, now what are we gonna do? I thought we were gonna be friends forever.
translation.zh: 现在我们该怎么办？ 我以为我们会是永远的朋友

translation.en: -We're not? -No.
translation.zh: -不是吗？ -不是

translation.en: We're not gonna be friends anymore, Debbie.
translation.zh: 我们不会再是朋友了 黛比

translation.en: -So you're gonna be a published author! -[Peter] That's-- Yeah. And you're gonna be a fancy editor.
translation.zh: -你要成为出版作家了！ -是啊 而你要成为优秀的编辑了

translation.en: -[Debbie] So weird. [laughs] -Big time.
translation.zh: 好奇怪 等不及去见杰克了

translation.en: -Can't wait to see Jack. -Oh, my God. He's gonna freak out.
translation.zh: 好奇怪 等不及去见杰克了 -他一定会开心死的 -等一下

translation.en: -He's gonna be so excited. -Wait a second.
translation.zh: -他一定会开心死的 -等一下

translation.en: Are we gonna be hand-holders?
translation.zh: 我们要变成牵手族吗？

translation.en: -I've never seen you hold a human's hand. -I don't hold hands!
translation.zh: -我从没见过你牵别人手 -我不牵手的

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 是啊！

translation.en: -But it-- it feels kind of… good. -What about this one?
translation.zh: -但感觉还挺好的 -那这样呢？

translation.en: -Yeah. I think we're hand-holders. -Mmm!
translation.zh: 嗯 我觉得我们是牵手族

translation.en: -Oh! Look at us. -I think we are.
translation.zh: 我同意 看看我们

translation.en: Okay, there he is. That's our Uber. All right. [sighs]
translation.zh: 好的 他来了 我们的优步 好嘞！

translation.en: So, what happens next?
translation.zh: 那接下来会怎样？

translation.en: ♪ To hang around with you ♪
translation.zh: （六个月后 在…）

translation.en: ♪ And maybe you think I'm lucky ♪
translation.zh: （六个月后 在…） （…出版了一本书之后（彼得）…）

translation.en: ♪ To have something to do ♪
translation.zh: （上上下下爬了十亿级阶梯的 迁入日之后（还是彼得）…）

translation.en: ♪ But I think that you're wild ♪
translation.zh: （上上下下爬了十亿级阶梯的 迁入日之后（还是彼得）…） （…在一家独立出版社 某得一职之后（黛比）…）

translation.en: ♪ Inside me is some child ♪
translation.zh: （…在一家独立出版社 某得一职之后（黛比）…）

translation.en: ♪ You might think I'm foolish ♪
translation.zh: （…以及许多 许多次 冰球训练之后（杰克）…）

translation.en: ♪ You might think I'm crazy ♪ ♪ All I want ♪
translation.zh: （他们过上了幸福快乐的生活）

translation.en: ♪ All I want is you ♪
translation.zh: （他们过上了幸福快乐的生活） （开个玩笑 婚姻生活不易）

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, ooh ♪
translation.zh: （开个玩笑 婚姻生活不易）

translation.en: ♪ All I want is you ♪
translation.zh: （开个玩笑 婚姻生活不易） （但他们的生活十分美满）

translation.en: -♪ All I want is you ♪ -♪ All I want is you ♪
translation.zh: （但他们的生活十分美满）

translation.en: ♪ We were embers ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：Ellen L
